• 开始使用

  • 场景
  • 主题

id=\"api\">API</h2><ul>\n<li>toggleShow: 切换 Alert 的显示状态。</li>\n</ul>\n<h2 id=\"props\">Props</h2><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>prefixCls</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&#39;kuma-alert&#39;</td>\n<td>类名前缀，不想使用 kuma 主题时使用</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>iconPrefixCls</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&#39;kuma-icon&#39;</td>\n<td>图标类名前缀，不想使用 kuma 主题时使用</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>className</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>额外的类名</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>type</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&#39;message&#39;</td>\n<td>警告类型，包括 message&#39;, &#39;error&#39;, &#39;warning&#39;, &#39;success&#39;, &#39;question&#39;, &#39;stop&#39;, &#39;wait&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>hasContainer</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td>是否包含外层容器</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>closable</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td>是否能够关闭,此项为 true 时,将自动包含外层容器</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>closeText</td>\n<td>string or react element</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>将关闭图标替换成想要的文字</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>message</td>\n<td>string or react element</td>\n<td>required</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>提示文案</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>description</td>\n<td>string or react element</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>描述文字，将自动包含外层容器</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onClose</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>在警告关闭时触发，传回 event</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a href=\"#api\">API</a></li><li><a id=\"props\">Props</h2><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注 </th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>component</td>\n<td>React.Element/String</td>\n<td>&#39;span&#39;</td>\n<td>使用什么元素或者组件来包裹 children，和 ReactCSSTransitionGroup 类似，如果不想有元素包裹，传 &#39;&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showProp</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>指定用于控制显示/隐藏的 prop</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>transitionName</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>和 ReactCSSTransitionGroup 类似，指定对应的 css 名</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>transitionAppear</td>\n<td>Boolean</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td>是否支持 Appear 动画</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>transitionEnter</td>\n<td>Boolean</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>是否支持 Enter 动画</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>transitionLeave</td>\n<td>Boolean</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>是否支持 Leave 动画</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onEnd</td>\n<td>function(key, exists)</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>动画结束时的回调</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a id=\"props\">props</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>参数</th>\n<th>说明</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>size</td>\n<td>按钮大小(<code>large</code> <code>medium</code> <code>small</code>)</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>medium</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>type</td>\n<td>类型(<code>primary</code> <code>secondary</code> <code>outline</code>)</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>blue</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>disabled</td>\n<td>是否禁用(<code>disabled</code> 或 <code>true</code> 用于在日历上标注非常规的休假、上班以及日程。<ul>\n<li>code should be an object like this {&#39;xxxx-xx-xx&#39;: [&#39;work/leave/schedule&#39;]}</li>\n<li>locale should be <code>zh-cn</code> or <code>en-us</code></li>\n</ul>\n</li>\n</ul>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a href=\"#何时使用\">何时使用</a><ul><li><a a class as a function\"); } }\n\nfunction _possibleConstructorReturn(self, call) { if (!self) { throw new ReferenceError(\"this hasn't been initialised - super() hasn't been called\"); } return call id=\"props\">Props</h2><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>Property</th>\n<th>Type</th>\n<th>Description</th>\n<th>Working</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>className</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>Additional class name for the inner slider div</td>\n<td>Yes</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>adaptiveHeight</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>Adjust the slide&#39;s height automatically</td>\n<td>Yes</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>arrows</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>Should we show Left and right nav arrows</td>\n<td>Yes</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>nextArrow</td>\n<td>React Component</td>\n<td>Use this component for the next arrow button</td>\n<td>Yes</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>prevArrow</td>\n<td>React Component</td>\n<td>Use this component for the prev arrow button</td>\n<td>Yes</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>autoplay</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>Should the scroller auto scroll?</td>\n<td>Yes</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>pauseOnHover</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>Should pause autoplay when an item is hoverd</td>\n<td>No</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>autoplaySpeed</td>\n<td>int</td>\n<td>delay between each auto scoll. in ms</td>\n<td>Yes</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>centerMode</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>Should we centre to a single item?</td>\n<td>Yes</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>centerPadding</td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>cssEase</td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>dots</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>Should we show the dots at the bottom of the gallery</td>\n<td>Yes</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>dotsClass</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>Class applied to the dots if they are enabled</td>\n<td>Yes</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>draggable</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>Is the gallery scrollable via dragging on desktop?</td>\n<td>Yes</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>easing</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>fade</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>Slides use fade for transition</td>\n<td>Yes</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>focusOnSelect</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>infinite</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>should the gallery wrap around it&#39;s contents</td>\n<td>Yes</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>initialSlide</td>\n<td>int</td>\n<td>which item should be the first to be displayed</td>\n<td>Yes</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>lazyLoad</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>Loads images or renders components on demands</td>\n<td>Yes</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>responsive</td>\n<td>array</td>\n<td>Array of objects in the form of <code>{ breakpoint: int, settings: { ... } }</code> The breakpoint <em>int</em> is the <code>maxWidth</code> so the settings will be applied when resolution is below this value. Breakpoints in the array should be ordered from smalles to greatest. Use &#39;unslick&#39; in place of the settings object to disable rendering the carousel at that breakpoint. Example: <code>[ { breakpoint: 768, settings: { slidesToShow: 3 } }, { breakpoint: 1024, settings: { slidesToShow: 5 } }, { breakpoint: 100000, settings: &#39;unslick&#39; } ]</code></td>\n<td>Yes</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>rtl</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>Reverses the slide order</td>\n<td>Yes</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>slide</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>slidesToShow</td>\n<td>int</td>\n<td>Number of slides to be visible at a time</td>\n<td>Yes</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>slidesToScroll</td>\n<td>int</td>\n<td>Number of slides to scroll for each navigation item</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>speed</td>\n<td>int</td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>swipe</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>swipeToSlide</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>touchMove</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>touchThreshold</td>\n<td>int</td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>variableWidth</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>useCSS</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>Enable/Disable CSS Transitions</td>\n<td>Yes</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>vertical</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>afterChange</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>callback function called after the strict\";\n\nvar Collapse = require('uxcore-collapse');\nvar Panel = Collapse.Panel;\n\nfunction callback(key) {\n console.log(key);\n}\n\nvar text = \"\\n A dog is a type of domesticated animal.\\n Known for its loyalty and faithfulness,\\n it can be found as a welcome guest in many households across the world.\\n\";\n\nReactDOM.render(React.createElement(\n Collapse,\n { defaultActiveKey: id=\"api\">API</h2><h2 id=\"props\">Props</h2><h3 id=\"collapse\">Collapse</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>activeKey</td>\n<td>array</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>the first panel key</td>\n<td>当前激活 tab 面板的 key 默认无，accordion模式下默认第一个元素</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>defaultActiveKey</td>\n<td>array</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>null</td>\n<td>初始化选中面板的 key</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>accordion</td>\n<td>Boolean</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td>手风琴模式</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onChange</td>\n<td>Function</td>\n<td>无</td>\n<td>切换面板的回调</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"collapse-panel\">Collapse.Panel</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>key</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>无</td>\n<td>对应 activeKey</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>header</td>\n<td>React.Element or String</td>\n<td>无</td>\n<td>面板头内容</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, configurable: true } }); if (superClass) Object.setPrototypeOf ? key: 'handleOk',\n value: function handleOk() {\n console.log('点击了确定');\n this.setState({\n visible: false\n });\n }\n }, {\n key: 'handleCancel',\n value: function handleCancel() {\n this.setState({\n visible: false\n });\n }\n }, {\n key: 'handleChange',\n value: function handleChange(value) {\n this.setState({\n effect: value\n });\n }\n }, {\n key: 'render',\n value: function return CustomFooter;\n}(React.Component);\n\nReactDOM.render(React.createElement(CustomFooter, null), document.getElementById('components-dialog-demo-confirm'));})()</script><div id=\"何时使用\">何时使用</h2><p>需要用户处理事务，又不希望跳转页面以致打断工作流程时，可以使用 <code>Dialog</code> 在当前页面正中打开一个浮层，承载相应的操作。</p>\n<h2 id=\"usage\">Usage</h2><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\">var</span> Dialog = <span class=\"hljs-built_in\">require</span>(<span class=\"hljs-string\">'uxcore-dialog'</span>);\nReactDOM.render(\n (<span class=\"xml\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">Dialog</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">title</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"第一个 Dialog\"</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">visible</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">{this.state.visible}</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">onOk</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">{this.handleOk.bind(this)}</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">onCancel</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">{this.handleCancel.bind(this)}</span>&gt;</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">p</span>&gt;</span>对话框的内容<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">p</span>&gt;</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">Dialog</span>&gt;</span>)</span>,\n <span class=\"hljs-built_in\">document</span>.getElementById(<span class=\"hljs-string\">'content'</span>)\n);</code></pre></div><h2 id=\"api\">API</h2><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>参数</th>\n<th>说明</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>title</td>\n<td>Title of the dialog</td>\n<td>String or React.Element</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>visible</td>\n<td>current dialog&#39;s visible status</td>\n<td>Boolean</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>mousePosition</td>\n<td>set pageX and pageY of current mouse(it will cause transform origin to be set).</td>\n<td>{x:number,y:number}</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onOk</td>\n<td>the callback when ok clicked</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onCancel</td>\n<td>the callback when dialog closed</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>width</td>\n<td>dialog width</td>\n<td>String or Number</td>\n<td>520</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>footer</td>\n<td>footer of the dialog</td>\n<td>React.Element</td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>closable</td>\n<td>whether show close button and click mask to close</td>\n<td>Boolean</td>\n<td>true</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>maskClosable</td>\n<td>whether click mask to close, this prop will be ignored if set closable prop to false</td>\n<td>Boolean</td>\n<td>true</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>locale</td>\n<td>国际化(包括 <code>zh-cn</code>, <code>en-us</code>, 和 <code>pl-pl</code>)</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td><code>zh-cn</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>className</td>\n<td>additional className for dialog</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>wrapClassName</td>\n<td>additional className for dialog wrap</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td><code>vertical-center-dailog</code> for vertical align the dialog</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>style</td>\n<td>Root style for dialog element.Such as width, height</td>\n<td>Object</td>\n<td>{}</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>zIndex</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>Number</td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>bodyStyle</td>\n<td>body style for dialog body element.Such as height</td>\n<td>Number</td>\n<td>{}</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"dialog-xxx\">Dialog.xxx()</h3><p>包括：</p>\n<ul>\n<li><code>Dialog.info</code></li>\n<li><code>Dialog.success</code></li>\n<li><code>Dialog.error</code></li>\n<li><code>Dialog.confirm</code></li>\n</ul>\n<p>以上均为一个函数，参数为 object，具体属性如下：</p>\n<table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>参数</th>\n<th>说明</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>title</td>\n<td>标题</td>\n<td>React.Element or String</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onOk</td>\n<td>点击确定回调，参数为关闭函数，返回 promise 时 resolve 后自动关闭</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onCancel</td>\n<td>取消回调，参数为关闭函数，返回 promise 时 resolve 后自动关闭</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>width</td>\n<td>宽度</td>\n<td>String or Number</td>\n<td>416</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>iconClassName</td>\n<td>图标样式名</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>kuma-icon-caution</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a href=\"#何时使用\">何时使用</a></li><li><a href=\"#usage\">Usage</a></li><li><a href=\"#api\">API</a><ul><li><a href=\"#dialog-xxx\">Dialog.xxx()</a></li></ul></ul>"},"site/components/dropdown/demo/click.md":{"title":"点击触发","id":"components-dropdown-demo-click","tags":[],"filepath":"site/components/dropdown/demo/click.md","directory":"components/dropdown/demo","filename":"click","meta":{"title":"点击触发","description":"\n<p>点击触发</p>\n","order":"2","filepath":"site/components/dropdown/demo/click.md","filename":"click","directory":"components/dropdown/demo","id":"components-dropdown-demo-click","template":"demos","html":"<script>(function(){'use strict';\n\nvar Dropdown = require('uxcore-dropdown');\nvar Menu = require('uxcore-menu');\nvar Button = require('uxcore-button');\n\nvar menu = React.createElement(\n Menu,\n null,\n React.createElement(\n Menu.Item,\n null,\n React.createElement(\n 'a',\n { target: '_blank', href: 'http://www.alipay.com/' },\n '第一个菜单项'\n )\n ),\n React.createElement(\n Menu.Item,\n null,\n React.createElement(\n 'a',\n { target: '_blank', href: 'http://www.taobao.com/' },\n '第二个菜单项'\n )\n ),\n React.createElement(\n Menu.Item,\n null,\n React.createElement(\n 'a',\n { target: '_blank', href: 'http://www.tmall.com/' },\n '第三个菜单项'\n )\n )\n);\n\nReactDOM.render(React.createElement(\n Dropdown,\n { overlay: menu, trigger: [\"click\"] },\n React.createElement(\n Button,\n null,\n '点击触发'\n )\n), document.getElementById('components-dropdown-demo-click'));})()</script><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\">const</span> Dropdown = }();\n\nfunction _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError(\"Cannot call a class as a function\"); } }\n\nfunction call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, configurable: true } }); if (superClass) Object.setPrototypeOf ? id=\"何时使用\">何时使用</h2><p>当页面元素过多时，用此组件可以收纳元素。点击或移入触点，会出现一个下拉菜单。可在列表中进行选择，并执行相应的命令。</p>\n<h2 id=\"api\">API</h2><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>参数</th>\n<th>说明</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>trigger</td>\n<td>触发下来行为</td>\n<td>array</td>\n<td><code>[&#39;hover&#39;]</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>overlay</td>\n<td>菜单节点</td>\n<td>uxcore-menu</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a pass) {\n console.log(e, pass);\n }\n\n changeMode() {\n this.setState({\n mode: this.state.mode == Constants.MODE.EDIT ? strict';\n\nvar _createClass = function () { function defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if (\"value\" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } } return function (Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }; }();\n\nfunction _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError(\"Cannot call a class as a function\"); } }\n\nfunction _possibleConstructorReturn(self, call) { if (!self) { throw new ReferenceError(\"this hasn't been initialised - super() hasn't been called\"); } return call && (typeof call === \"object\" || typeof call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, configurable: true } }); if (superClass) Object.setPrototypeOf ? Object.setPrototypeOf(subClass, superClass) : subClass.__proto__ = superClass; }\n\nvar Button = require('uxcore-button');\nvar Form = require('uxcore-form');\nvar Constants = Form.Constants;\nvar FormRowTitle = Form.FormRowTitle;\nvar Row = Form.FormRow;\nvar Input = Form.InputFormField;\nvar Date = Form.DateFormField;\nvar TextArea = Form.TextAreaFormField;\nvar ButtonGroupFormField = Form.ButtonGroupFormField;\nvar Validators = Form.Validators;\n\nvar Demo = function (_React$Component) {\n _inherits(Demo, _React$Component);\n\n function Demo(props) {\n _classCallCheck(this, Demo);\n\n var _this = _possibleConstructorReturn(this, (Demo.__proto__ || Object.getPrototypeOf(Demo)).call(this, props));\n\n _this.state = {};\n return _this;\n }\n\n _createClass(Demo, [{\n key: 'handleSubmit',\n value: function handleSubmit() {\n console.log(this.refs.form.getValues());\n }\n }, {\n key: 'render',\n value: function render() {\n var me = this;\n return React.createElement(\n 'div',\n { className: 'demo-horizon' },\n React.createElement('style', null),\n React.createElement(\n Form,\n { ref: 'form', className: 'demo-horizon-form' },\n React.createElement(\n Row,\n null,\n validator(value) {\n return value.length < 3;\n }, errMsg: \"不能超过3个字\" }] }),\n React.createElement(Input, { jsxname: 'location', jsxlabel: '地点', required: true, jsxplaceholder: '请输入地点', jsxrules: [{ validator: Validators.isNotEmpty, errMsg: \"不能为空\" }] })\n ),\n React.createElement(TextArea, { jsxname: 'content', jsxlabel: '内容', required: true, jsxrules: [{ validator: Validators.isNotEmpty, errMsg: \"不能为空\" }] }),\n React.createElement(\n ButtonGroupFormField,\n null,\n React.createElement(\n Button,\n { size: 'large', onClick: me.handleSubmit.bind(me) },\n '确定'\n )\n )\n )\n );\n }\n };\n return _this;\n }\n\n _createClass(Demo, [{\n key: 'handleSubmit',\n value: function handleSubmit() {\n console.log(this.refs.form.getValues());\n }\n }, {\n key: 'handleModeChange',\n value: function handleModeChange(values, name) {\n console.log(values[name]);\n this.setState({\n mode: values[name] == \"true\" ? true : false\n });\n }\n }, {\n key: 'render',\n value: function render() {\n var me = this;\n console.log(me.state.mode);\n return React.createElement(\n 'div',\n { className: 'demo-basic' },\n React.createElement(\n 'style',\n null,\n \".required {font-family:Simsun} .demo-basic-form {width: 532px} .form-select {background: #ccc; border-radius: 5px; padding-top: 15px; width: 530px; margin-bottom: 40px;}\"\n ),\n React.createElement(\n Form,\n { className: 'form-select', jsxvalues: { mode: \"true\" }, jsxonChange: me.handleModeChange.bind(me) },\n React.createElement(SelectFormField, { jsxdata: { \"true\": \"实时校验\", \"false\": \"非实时校验\" }, jsxname: 'mode', jsxlabel: '校验模式', showSearch: false })\n ),\n React.createElement(\n Form,\n { ref: 'form', className: 'demo-basic-form', instantValidate: me.state.mode },\n React.createElement(Input, { jsxname: 'theme', jsxlabel: '主题', required: true, jsxplaceholder: '请输入主题', jsxrules: [{ validator: Validators.isNotEmpty, errMsg: \"不能为空\" }, { validator: function validator(value) {\n return value.length <= 3;\n }, errMsg: \"不能超过3个字\" }] }),\n React.createElement(Input, { jsxname: 'location', jsxlabel: '地点', required: true, jsxplaceholder: '请输入地点', jsxrules: [{ validator: Validators.isNotEmpty, errMsg: \"不能为空\" }] }),\n React.createElement(Date, { jsxname: 'date', jsxlabel: '时间', jsxtype: 'cascade' }),\n React.createElement(TextArea, { jsxname: 'content', jsxlabel: '内容', required: true, jsxrules: [{ validator: Validators.isNotEmpty, errMsg: \"不能为空\" }] }),\n React.createElement(\n ButtonGroupFormField,\n null,\n React.createElement(\n Button,\n { size: 'large', onClick: me.handleSubmit.bind(me) },\n '确定'\n )\n )\n )\n );\n }\n }]);\n\n return Demo;\n}(React.Component);\n\n;\n\nReactDOM.render(React.createElement(Demo, null), document.getElementById('components-form-demo-validator'));})()</script><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\">let</span> Button = <span class=\"hljs-built_in\">require</span>(<span class=\"hljs-string\">'uxcore-button'</span>);\n<span class=\"hljs-keyword\">let</span> Form = <span class=\"hljs-built_in\">require</span>(<span class=\"hljs-string\">'uxcore-form'</span>);\n<span class=\"hljs-keyword\">let</span> {\n Constants,\n FormRowTitle,\n FormRow: Row,\n InputFormField: Input,\n DateFormField: <span handleModeChange(values, name) {\n <span class=\"hljs-built_in\">console</span>.log(values[name]);\n <span class=\"hljs-keyword\">this</span>.setState({\n mode: values[name] == <span document.getElementById('components-form-demo-validator'))</span></code></pre></div>"},"status":"public","toc":""},"site/components/form/index.md":{"title":"Form","id":"components-form-index","tags":{"author":{"name":"eternalsky"}},"filepath":"site/components/form/index.md","directory":"components/form","filename":"index","meta":{"title":"Form","description":"form","order":"7","category":"Components","screenshots":"example/screenshot.png","chinese":"表单","subtype":"Form Control","filepath":"site/components/form/index.md","filename":"index","directory":"components/form","id":"components-form-index","template":"components","html":"<hr>\n<h2 id=\"usage\">Usage</h2><blockquote>\n<p>see Demos for details<br>每一个 field 需要按照 Form -&gt; FormRow -&gt; FormField 的方式进行嵌套，允许 Form -&gt; FormField 的嵌套，会自动增加 FormRow 这一层，并默认占一整行。</p>\n</blockquote>\n<h2 id=\"api\">API</h2><h3 id=\"form\">Form</h3><ul>\n<li><p>getValues(force) 获取目前的 values 和 pass（是否通过检测）。<br>参数：</p>\n<ul>\n<li>force <code>Boolean</code>: 强制校验或不校验，undefined 时则忽略此配置。</li>\n</ul>\n</li>\n<li><p>resetValues() 重置所有的 FormField，如果有默认值则重置为默认值。</p>\n</li>\n<li><p>setValues(data) 手动设置各个 FormField 的值，在表单联动时可能会用得到。\n参数：</p>\n<ul>\n<li>data <code>Object</code>: 和 jsxvalues 的格式相同。</li>\n</ul>\n</li>\n<li><p>isDirty() 获取目前的数据是否没有通过检测，返回 true 或 false。</p>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<h2 id=\"props\">props</h2><h3 id=\"form\">Form</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>className</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;&quot;</td>\n<td>加入额外的类名，在使用 kuma 的基础上进行适当的定制时会用得到</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxprefixCls</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;kuma-form&quot;</td>\n<td>默认类名，用户可以通过修改此项来完成样式的定制</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxmode</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;EDIT&quot;</td>\n<td>Form 编辑和只读模式，传值方式见 demo</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxvalues</td>\n<td>object</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>传入表单的初始值，格式见 Usage，每一个 key 与 formField 中的 jsxname 相对应，注意是初始值，不要把 onChange 中的变化同步到这里</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxonChange</td>\n<td>function(values, name, pass)</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>当表单中值有变化时触发，传回 values，格式同 jsxvalues，同时传回发生变化的表单域的 name，以及该表单域是否通过校验</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>instantValidate</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>是否开启即时校验</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"jsxvalues-的格式\">jsxvalues 的格式</h3><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">{\n jsxname1: value1,\n jsxname2: value2\n}</code></pre></div><h3 id=\"formrow\">FormRow</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>className</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;&quot;</td>\n<td>加入额外的类名，在使用 kuma 的基础上进行适当的定制时会用得到</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxprefixCls</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;kuma-form-row&quot;</td>\n<td>默认类名，用户可以通过修改此项来完成样式的定制</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"formfield-通用配置\">FormField 通用配置</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>className</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;&quot;</td>\n<td>加入额外的类名，在使用 kuma 的基础上进行适当的定制时会用得到</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxshow</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>是否显示该表单域，不显示的表单域将不占宽度</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxmode</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;EDIT&quot;</td>\n<td>FormField 的编辑和只读模式，优先级高于 Form，传值方式见 demo</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxshowLabel</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>是否显示 label</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxname</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>required</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>表单字段，返回值时该字段将作为 key</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxlabel</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>required</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>左侧的说明文字，不写即为留白</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxprefixCls</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;kuma-form-field&quot;</td>\n<td>默认类名，用户可以通过修改此项来完成样式的定制</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxflex</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>1</td>\n<td>占 FormRow 宽的比例，类似于 css3 中的 flex-box</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxtips</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;&quot;</td>\n<td>说明文字</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxrules</td>\n<td>object/array</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>validators，具体用法和格式见 Usage，Form 已经提供了一些现成的 validator 供使用。也可以自己编写</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>instantValidate</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>是否开启即时校验</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"validators\">Validators</h3><blockquote>\n<p>Form 提供了一些通用的 validator，通过 Form.Validators 来引入。用法还是见 Usage 和 <code>demo/formDemo.js</code> 包括：\n所有的 validator 返回 true，表示通过。\nvalidator 也可以自己定义，会传入相应的表单值，根据判断，返回 true，表示通过。</p>\n</blockquote>\n<ul>\n<li>isNotEmpty</li>\n<li>isNum</li>\n<li>isInt: 是否是整数</li>\n<li>isDecimal: 是否是小数</li>\n<li>isArray</li>\n<li>isRegExp</li>\n<li>isObject</li>\n<li>isFunc</li>\n<li>isEmail</li>\n<li>isUrl</li>\n<li>isHex</li>\n<li>isIdCard: 是否是中国身份证。</li>\n<li>isCNMobile: 是否是中国手机号。</li>\n</ul>\n<h3 id=\"formfield-专属配置\">FormField 专属配置</h3><blockquote>\n<p>所有的 FormField 都共享通用配置，所有的专属配置在 <code>demo/formDemo.js</code>，均有体现。</p>\n</blockquote>\n<h3 id=\"inputformfield\">InputFormField</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n<th>版本</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxplaceholder</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;&quot;</td>\n<td>占位符</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxdisabled</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td>disable 状态</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>validateOnBlur</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td>验证是否是在 blur 的时候出发，默认情况是在 change 时触发，此项为 true 后，onChange 的 pass 永远为 true，相对应的 onBlur 的 pass 会随之变化</td>\n<td>1.2.10</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onKeyDown</td>\n<td>function(e)</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>监听键盘事件</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onBlur</td>\n<td>function(e, pass)</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>输入框 blur 时触发，第二个参数为验证是否通过，若 validateOnBlur 为 false，则 pass 永远为 true</td>\n<td>1.2.10</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onFocus</td>\n<td>function(e)</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>输入框获取焦点时触发</td>\n<td>1.2.10</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>renderView</td>\n<td>function(value)</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>自定义渲染 view 状态，参数是默认渲染的值</td>\n<td>1.6.0</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>autoTrim</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>自动去除值两端的空格</td>\n<td>1.2.12</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>inputType</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&#39;text&#39;</td>\n<td>input 的 type，目前支持 &quot;text&quot; 和 &quot;password&quot;</td>\n<td>1.2.23</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<ul>\n<li><p>插件：</p>\n<ul>\n<li>Count，通过 InputFormField.Count 取得，一个内置的计数器，用法如下：</li>\n</ul>\n<div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">&lt;InputFormField&gt;\n <span class=\"xml\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">Count</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">total</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"20\"</span>&gt;</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">InputFormField</span>&gt;</span></span></code></pre></div><ul>\n<li>LeftAddon/RightAddon，通过 InputFormField.LeftAddon/InputFormField.RightAddon 取得，给 input 左侧加入自定义的图标或文字，用法如下：</li>\n</ul>\n<div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">&lt;InputFormField&gt;\n <span class=\"xml\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">LeftAddon</span>&gt;</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">i</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">className</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"kuma-icon kuma-icon-phone\"</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">i</span>&gt;</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">LeftAddon</span>&gt;</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">RightAddon</span>&gt;</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">span</span>&gt;</span>元<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">span</span>&gt;</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">RightAddon</span>&gt;</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">InputFormField</span>&gt;</span></span></code></pre></div></li>\n</ul>\n<h3 id=\"textareaformfield\">TextAreaFormField</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxplaceholder</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;&quot;</td>\n<td>占位符</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>validateOnBlur</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td>验证是否是在 blur 的时候出发，默认情况是在 change 时触发，此项为 true 后，onChange 的 pass 永远为 true，相对应的 onBlur 的 pass 会随之变化</td>\n<td>1.2.11</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onKeyDown</td>\n<td>function(e)</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>监听键盘事件</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onBlur</td>\n<td>function(e, pass)</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>输入框 blur 时触发，第二个参数为验证是否通过，若 validateOnBlur 为 false，则 pass 永远为 true</td>\n<td>1.2.11</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onFocus</td>\n<td>function(e)</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>输入框获取焦点时触发</td>\n<td>1.2.11</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>autoTrim</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>自动去除值两端的空格</td>\n<td>1.2.12</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>autosize</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>根据内容自动撑开(IE8 下无效)</td>\n<td>1.3.10</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<blockquote>\n<p>配置 autosize 的同时，还可以通过样式指定 min-height 和 max-height</p>\n</blockquote>\n<h3 id=\"radiogroupformfield\">RadioGroupFormField</h3><ul>\n<li>Item：通过 RadioGroupFormField.Item 取得，有两个 props<ul>\n<li>value</li>\n<li>text：显示的值</li>\n</ul>\n</li>\n<li>使用方式：</li>\n</ul>\n<div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">&lt;RadioGroupFormField&gt;\n <span class=\"xml\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">Item</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">value</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"1\"</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">text</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"a\"</span>&gt;</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">Item</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">value</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"2\"</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">text</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"b\"</span>&gt;</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">Item</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">value</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"3\"</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">text</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"c\"</span>&gt;</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">RadioGroupFormField</span>&gt;</span></span></code></pre></div><h3 id=\"selectformfield\">SelectFormField</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxdata</td>\n<td>object</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>传入用于生成列表的数据，格式为{value: text}</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxfetchUrl</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>如果 Select 是通过搜索异步获取选项，则需要填入此项</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxstyle</td>\n<td>obj</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>与 react 传入 style 的方式相同，修改选择框的样式</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>beforeFetch</td>\n<td>func</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>会传入 {q: value}， value 为搜索框中变化的值，在发出 ajax 请求之前，将数据处理为应该发送的格式，并需返回该数据。</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>afterFetch</td>\n<td>func</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>会传入返回的数据， 将其处理为 jsxdata 的格式并返回</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>dataType</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&#39;json&#39;</td>\n<td>发送 ajax 请求的类型</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h4 id=\"jsxdata-的格式\">jsxdata 的格式</h4><p>jsxdata 目前支持两种格式</p>\n<div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\">// Object</span>\n{\n a: <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"A\"</span>,\n b: <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"B\"</span>\n}\n<span class=\"hljs-comment\">// Array</span>\n[\n {\n value: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'a'</span>,\n text: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'A'</span>\n }\n]</code></pre></div><blockquote>\n<p>此外，SelectFormField 还支持 <a href=\"https://www.npmjs.com/package/uxcore-select2\">uxcore-select2</a> 除 onSelect/onDeselect 外的全部属性。</p>\n</blockquote>\n<h3 id=\"searchformfield\">SearchFormField</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>advancedOptions</td>\n<td>array</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>右侧高级选项的选择项：格式为<code>[{value: xxx, text: xxx}]</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>advancedConfig</td>\n<td>object</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>右侧高级选项的配置，同 <code>uxcore-select2</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>classOptions</td>\n<td>array</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>左侧类别选项的选择项：格式为<code>[{value: xxx, text: xxx}]</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>classConfig</td>\n<td>object</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>左侧类别选项的配置，同 <code>uxcore-select2</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>tidy</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>精简模式</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onIconClick</td>\n<td>function(e)</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>点击搜索图标触发回调</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<blockquote>\n<p>该组件继承自 SelectFormField，支持 SelectFormField 的全部 props。</p>\n</blockquote>\n<h3 id=\"checkboxgroupformfield\">CheckboxGroupFormField</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxdisabled</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td>disable 状态</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<ul>\n<li>Item：通过 CheckboxGroupFormField.Item 取的，有两个 props<ul>\n<li>value</li>\n<li>text：显示的值</li>\n<li>disabled：该 Item 的 disable 状态。</li>\n</ul>\n</li>\n<li>使用方式：</li>\n</ul>\n<div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">&lt;CheckboxGroupFormField&gt;\n <span class=\"xml\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">Item</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">value</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"1\"</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">text</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"a\"</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">disabled</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">{true}</span>&gt;</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">Item</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">value</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"2\"</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">text</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"b\"</span>&gt;</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">Item</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">value</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"3\"</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">text</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"c\"</span>&gt;</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">CheckboxGroupFormField</span>&gt;</span></span></code></pre></div><h3 id=\"dateformfield\">DateFormField</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxtype</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>single</td>\n<td>single/cascade 单独、级联</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxfrom</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>开始日期</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxto</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>结束日期</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>panel</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;day&quot;</td>\n<td>何种面板,枚举值为&quot;month&quot;,&quot;year&quot;和&quot;day&quot;</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<p>除此之外，支持除 onSelect，<a href=\"https://www.npmjs.com/package/uxcore-calendar\">uxcore-calendar</a> 的所有 props。</p>\n<h3 id=\"numberinputformfield\">NumberInputFormField</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxplaceholder</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;&quot;</td>\n<td>占位符</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxtype</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;&quot;</td>\n<td>目前支持 &quot;money&quot;, &quot;cnmobile&quot; 和 &quot;card&quot;, 提供三种格式化显示的方法。&quot;money&quot;的格式为<code>123 121 121.213 121</code>,&quot;cnmobile&quot;的格式为 <code>86 1565 7263 8223</code>, &quot;card&quot; 的格式为 <code>3321 3123 3243 4343</code></td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"cascadeselectformfield\">CascadeSelectFormField</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxdata</td>\n<td>object</td>\n<td>required</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>级联选择框，只支持直接传入 data 初始化，格式见 Usage 中的 casData，length 为必须传的 key，告诉 field 有几层级联。</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxplaceholder</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;请下拉选择&quot;</td>\n<td>占位符</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxstyle</td>\n<td>object</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>与 react 传入 style 的方式相同，修改选择框的样式</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"pickableformfield\">PickableFormField</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>multiple</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>是否支持多选</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>value</td>\n<td>string/number</td>\n<td>required</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>pickable Item 对应的值</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>type</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>normal</td>\n<td>样式风格，可选值为normal,simple,hook</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>max</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>99</td>\n<td>最大显示的数字，超过 max，显示 max+</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"editorformfield\">EditorFormField</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>placeholder</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;&quot;</td>\n<td>占位符</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxcontent</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;&quot;</td>\n<td>由于 tinymce 的默认值传法的特殊性，EditorFormField 的默认值通过此 prop 传入</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxconfig</td>\n<td>object</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>{}</td>\n<td>用户自定义的配置项，tinyMCE 的配置项，官方文档中所有 init 部分的配置在这里完成，详细见 <a href=\"http://www.tinymce.com/wiki.php/Configuration\">http://www.tinymce.com/wiki.php/Configuration</a></td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"otherformfield\">OtherFormField</h3><blockquote>\n<p>OtherFormField 是一个特殊的 FormField，它用来和其他 FormField 一起完成布局（比如在一行排列等），如果需要一些装饰类的东西，可以以子元素的形式传入到这个 Field 里。\n他也可以用于布局中的占位。 </p>\n</blockquote>\n<h3 id=\"buttongroupformfield\">ButtonGroupFormField</h3><blockquote>\n<p>ButtonGroupFormField 是一个特殊的 FormField，它用来生成一些特定的表单按钮，这是为了与 Grid 相结合而准备的。如果需要自定义一些按钮，请使用 OtherFormField 和 uxcore-button 相结合来使用。<br>你可以像这样使用它： </p>\n<div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\">var</span> Button = <span class=\"hljs-built_in\">require</span>(<span class=\"hljs-string\">'uxcore-button'</span>);\n<span class=\"xml\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">ButtonGroupFormField</span>&gt;</span>\n {// handleClick 会被传入一个参数 data，取得的值和 API getValues() 相同}\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">Button</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">action</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"submit\"</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">onClick</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">{this.handleClick.bind(this)}</span>/&gt;</span>\n {// 目前只支持 submit 和 reset 两种 action}\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">Button</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">action</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"reset\"</span>/&gt;</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">ButtonGroupFormField</span>&gt;</span></span></code></pre></div></blockquote>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a href=\"#usage\">Usage</a></li><li><a href=\"#api\">API</a><ul><li><a href=\"#form\">Form</a></li></ul></li><li><a href=\"#props\">props</a><ul><li><a href=\"#form\">Form</a></li><li><a href=\"#jsxvalues-的格式\">jsxvalues 的格式</a></li><li><a href=\"#formrow\">FormRow</a></li><li><a href=\"#formfield-通用配置\">FormField 通用配置</a></li><li><a href=\"#validators\">Validators</a></li><li><a href=\"#formfield-专属配置\">FormField 专属配置</a></li><li><a id=\"usage\">Usage</h2><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\">var</span> Formatter = <span class=\"hljs-built_in\">require</span>(<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"uxcore-formatter\"</span>);\n<span class=\"hljs-built_in\">console</span>.log(Formatter.date(<span class=\"hljs-keyword\">new</span> <span class=\"hljs-built_in\">Date</span>(), <span class=\"hljs-string\">'YYYY-MM-DD'</span>);</code></pre></div><h2 id=\"api\">API</h2><blockquote>\n<p>目前提供的函数包括：</p>\n</blockquote>\n<h3 id=\"date\">Date</h3><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">Formatter.date(<span class=\"hljs-keyword\">new</span> <span class=\"hljs-built_in\">Date</span>(), <span class=\"hljs-string\">'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss'</span>); <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 2015-10-12 14:22:16</span></code></pre></div><h3 id=\"money\">money</h3><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">\nFormatter.money(<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"6566456.65466545\"</span>) <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// \"6 566 456.65466545\"</span>\nFormatter.money(<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"6566456.65466545\"</span>, <span class=\"hljs-string\">\",\"</span>) <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// \"6,566,456.65466545\"</span>\nFormatter.money(<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"6566456\"</span>, <span class=\"hljs-string\">\",\"</span>) <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// \"6,566,456\"</span>\nFormatter.money(<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"6566456\"</span>, <span class=\"hljs-string\">\",\"</span>, <span class=\"hljs-number\">4</span>) <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// \"6,566,456.0000\"</span>\nFormatter.money(<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"6566456\"</span>, <span class=\"hljs-string\">\",\"</span>, <span class=\"hljs-number\">2</span>) <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// \"6,566,456.00\"</span>\nFormatter.money(<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"6566456.65466545\"</span>, <span class=\"hljs-string\">\",\"</span>, <span class=\"hljs-number\">4</span>) <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// \"6,566,456.6547\"</span>\nFormatter.money(<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"6566456.65466545\"</span>, <span class=\"hljs-string\">\",\"</span>, <span class=\"hljs-number\">2</span>) <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// \"6,566,456.65\"</span></code></pre></div><h3 id=\"cnmobile\">cnmobile</h3><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">Formatter.cnmobile(<span class=\"hljs-string\">'+8615652988282'</span>, <span class=\"hljs-string\">' '</span>); <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// +86 1565 2988 282</span></code></pre></div><h3 id=\"card\">card</h3><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">Formatter.cnmobile(<span class=\"hljs-string\">'1565298828212233'</span>, <span class=\"hljs-string\">' '</span>); <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 1565 2988 2821 2233</span></code></pre></div>"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a href=\"#usage\">Usage</a></li><li><a href=\"#api\">API</a><ul><li><a href=\"#date\">Date</a></li><li><a href=\"#money\">money</a></li><li><a href=\"#cnmobile\">cnmobile</a></li><li><a href=\"#card\">card</a></li></ul></ul>"},"site/components/grid/demo/basic.md":{"title":"基本","id":"components-grid-demo-basic","tags":[],"filepath":"site/components/grid/demo/basic.md","directory":"components/grid/demo","filename":"basic","meta":{"title":"基本","description":"\n","order":"0","filepath":"site/components/grid/demo/basic.md","filename":"basic","directory":"components/grid/demo","id":"components-grid-demo-basic","template":"demos","html":"<script>(function(){'use strict';\n\nvar _createClass = function () { function defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if (\"value\" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } } return function (Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }; }();\n\nfunction _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError(\"Cannot call a class as a function\"); } }\n\nfunction _possibleConstructorReturn(self, call) { if (!self) { throw new ReferenceError(\"this hasn't been initialised - super() hasn't been called\"); } return call && (typeof call === \"object\" || typeof call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, configurable: true } }); if (superClass) Object.setPrototypeOf ? Object.setPrototypeOf(subClass, superClass) : subClass.__proto__ = superClass; }\n\nvar Grid = require('uxcore-grid');\nvar classnames = require('classnames');\nvar Row = Grid.Row;\nvar Col = Grid.Col;\n\nvar Demo = function (_React$Component) {\n _inherits(Demo, _React$Component);\n\n function Demo(props) {\n _classCallCheck(this, Demo);\n\n var _this = _possibleConstructorReturn(this, (Demo.__proto__ || Object.getPrototypeOf(Demo)).call(this, props));\n\n _this.state = {};\n return _this;\n }\n\n _createClass(Demo, [{\n key: 'render',\n value: function render() {\n return React.createElement(\n 'div',\n null,\n React.createElement(\n Grid,\n { fluid: true },\n React.createElement(\n Row,\n { className: 'show-grid' },\n React.createElement(\n Col,\n { xs: 24, md: 16 },\n React.createElement(\n 'code',\n null,\n '<',\n 'Col xs={24} md={16}',\n ' />'\n )\n ),\n React.createElement(\n Col,\n { xs: 12, md: 8 },\n React.createElement(\n 'code',\n null,\n '<',\n 'Col xs={12} md={8}',\n ' />'\n )\n )\n ),\n React.createElement(\n Row,\n { className: 'show-grid' },\n React.createElement(\n Col,\n { xs: 12, md: 8 },\n React.createElement(\n 'code',\n null,\n '<',\n 'Col xs={12} md={8}',\n ' />'\n )\n ),\n React.createElement(\n Col,\n { xs: 12, md: 8 },\n React.createElement(\n 'code',\n null,\n '<',\n 'Col xs={12} md={8}',\n ' />'\n )\n ),\n React.createElement(\n Col,\n { xs: 12, md: 8 },\n React.createElement(\n 'code',\n null,\n '<',\n 'Col xs={12} md={8}',\n ' />'\n )\n )\n ),\n React.createElement(\n Row,\n { className: 'show-grid' },\n React.createElement(\n Col,\n { xs: 12, xsOffset: 12 },\n React.createElement(\n 'code',\n null,\n '<',\n 'Col xs={12} xsOffset={12}',\n ' />'\n )\n )\n ),\n React.createElement(\n Row,\n { className: 'show-grid' },\n React.createElement(\n Col,\n { md: 12, mdPush: 12 },\n React.createElement(\n 'code',\n null,\n '<',\n 'Col md={12} mdPush={12}',\n ' />'\n )\n ),\n React.createElement(\n Col,\n { md: 12, mdPull: 12 },\n React.createElement(\n 'code',\n null,\n '<',\n 'Col md={12} mdPull={12}',\n ' />'\n )\n )\n )\n )\n );\n }\n }]);\n\n return Demo;\n}(React.Component);\n\n;\n\nReactDOM.render(React.createElement(Demo, null), document.getElementById('components-grid-demo-basic'));})()</script><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code gird, will including checkbox, edit text field, column pick etc","category":"Components","chinese":"栅格","order":"1","subtype":"Layout","filepath":"site/components/grid/index.md","filename":"index","directory":"components/grid","id":"components-grid-index","template":"components","html":"<h2 id=\"usage\">Usage</h2><blockquote>\n<p>有关栅格的基础知识，参考 <a href=\"http://v3.bootcss.com/css/#grid。\">http://v3.bootcss.com/css/#grid。</a></p>\n</blockquote>\n<h2 id=\"api\">API</h2><h2 id=\"props\">Props</h2><h3 id=\"grid\">Grid</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>componentClass</td>\n<td>elementType</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&#39;div&#39;</td>\n<td>You can use a custom element for this component</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>fluid</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td>Turn any fixed-width grid layout into a full-width layout by this property. Adds <code>container-fluid</code> class.</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"row\">Row</h3><blockquote>\n<p>通过 <code>Grid.Row</code> 取得。</p>\n</blockquote>\n<table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>componentClass</td>\n<td>elementType</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&#39;div&#39;</td>\n<td>You can use a custom element for this component</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"col\">Col</h3><blockquote>\n<p>通过 <code>Grid.Col</code> 取得。</p>\n</blockquote>\n<table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>lg</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>The number of columns you wish to span for Large devices Desktops (≥1200px) <code>class-prefix col-lg-</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>lgOffset</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>Move columns to the right for Large devices Desktops <code>class-prefix col-lg-offset-</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>lgPull</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>Change the order of grid columns to the left for Large devices Desktops <code>class-prefix col-lg-pull-</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>lgPush</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>Change the order of grid columns to the right for Large devices Desktops <code>class-prefix col-lg-push-</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>md</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>The number of columns you wish to span for Medium devices Desktops (≥992px) <code>class-prefix col-md-</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>mdOffset</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>Move columns to the right for Medium devices Desktops <code>class-prefix col-md-offset-</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>mdPull</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>Change the order of grid columns to the left for Medium devices Desktops <code>class-prefix col-md-pull-</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>mdPush</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>Change the order of grid columns to the right for Medium devices Desktops <code>class-prefix col-md-push-</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>sm</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>The number of columns you wish to span for Small devices Tablets (≥768px) <code>class-prefix col-sm-</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>smOffset</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>Move columns to the right for Small devices Tablets <code>class-prefix col-sm-offset-</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>smPull</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>Change the order of grid columns to the left for Small devices Tablets <code>class-prefix col-sm-pull-</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>smPush</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>Change the order of grid columns to the right for Small devices Tablets <code>class-prefix col-sm-push-</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>xs</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>The number of columns you wish to span for Extra small devices Phones (&lt;768px) <code>class-prefix col-xs-</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>xsOffset</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>Move columns to the right for Extra small devices Phones <code>class-prefix col-xs-offset-</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>xsPull</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>Change the order of grid columns to the left for Extra small devices Phones <code>class-prefix col-xs-pull-</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>xsPush</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>Change the order of grid columns to the right for Extra small devices Phones <code>class-prefix col-xs-push-</code></td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a href=\"#usage\">Usage</a></li><li><a href=\"#api\">API</a></li><li><a href=\"#props\">Props</a><ul><li><a href=\"#grid\">Grid</a></li><li><a href=\"#row\">Row</a></li><li><a href=\"#col\">Col</a></li></ul></ul>"},"site/components/layout/demo/bothfixed.md":{"title":"左右都固定","id":"components-layout-demo-bothfixed","tags":[],"filepath":"site/components/layout/demo/bothfixed.md","directory":"components/layout/demo","filename":"bothfixed","meta":{"title":"左右都固定","description":"\n","order":"2","filepath":"site/components/layout/demo/bothfixed.md","filename":"bothfixed","directory":"components/layout/demo","id":"components-layout-demo-bothfixed","template":"demos","html":"<script>(function(){'use strict';\n\nvar _createClass = function () { function defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if (\"value\" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } } return function (Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }; }();\n\nfunction _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError(\"Cannot call a class as a function\"); } }\n\nfunction _possibleConstructorReturn(self, call) { if (!self) { throw new ReferenceError(\"this hasn't been initialised - super() hasn't been called\"); } return call && (typeof call === \"object\" || typeof call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, configurable: true } }); if (superClass) Object.setPrototypeOf ? Object.setPrototypeOf(subClass, superClass) : subClass.__proto__ = superClass; }\n\nvar Layout = require('uxcore-layout');\nvar Left = Layout.Left;\nvar Right = Layout.Right;\n\nvar classnames = require('classnames');\n\nvar Demo = function (_React$Component) {\n _inherits(Demo, _React$Component);\n\n function Demo(props) {\n _classCallCheck(this, Demo);\n\n return _possibleConstructorReturn(this, (Demo.__proto__ || Object.getPrototypeOf(Demo)).call(this, props));\n }\n\n _createClass(Demo, [{\n key: 'render',\n value: function render() {\n return React.createElement(\n 'div',\n null,\n React.createElement(\n Layout,\n { className: 'layoutDemo fixed' },\n React.createElement(\n Left,\n { width: 500, className: 'left' },\n '左'\n ),\n React.createElement(\n Right,\n { width: 500, className: 'right' },\n '右'\n )\n )\n );\n }\n }]);\n\n return Demo;\n}(React.Component);\n\nReactDOM.render(React.createElement(Demo, null), document.getElementById('components-layout-demo-bothfixed'));})()</script><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\">let</span> Layout = <span 190 px，右侧自适应</p>\n","order":"1","filepath":"site/components/layout/demo/rightfixed.md","filename":"rightfixed","directory":"components/layout/demo","id":"components-layout-demo-rightfixed","template":"demos","html":"<script>(function(){'use strict';\n\nvar _createClass = function () { function defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if (\"value\" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } } return function (Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }; }();\n\nfunction _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError(\"Cannot call a class as a function\"); } }\n\nfunction _possibleConstructorReturn(self, call) { if (!self) { throw new ReferenceError(\"this hasn't been initialised - super() hasn't been called\"); } return call && (typeof call === \"object\" || typeof call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, configurable: true } }); if (superClass) Object.setPrototypeOf ? Object.setPrototypeOf(subClass, superClass) : subClass.__proto__ = superClass; }\n\nvar Layout = require('uxcore-layout');\nvar Left = Layout.Left;\nvar Right = Layout.Right;\n\nvar classnames = kuma 的基础上进行适当的定制时会用得到</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h2 id=\"子组件\">子组件</h2><h3 kuma 的基础上进行适当的定制时会用得到</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>width</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>500</td>\n<td>布局块的宽度，仅在定宽时起作用</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>adaptive</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td>是否为自适应，未设定 }();\n\nfunction _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError(\"Cannot call a class as a function\"); } }\n\nfunction _possibleConstructorReturn(self, call) { if (!self) { throw new ReferenceError(\"this hasn't been initialised - super() hasn't been called\"); } return call && (typeof call === \"object\" || typeof call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, configurable: true } }); if (superClass) Object.setPrototypeOf ? value: function onLoadMore() {\n var me = this;\n\n me.setState({\n loadState: 'loading'\n });\n\n setTimeout(function () {\n var lines = me.state.lines;\n\n if (++loadTimes < 5) {\n for (var i = 0; i < 50; i++) {\n lines.push(React.createElement(\n 'p',\n { key: loadTimes + '-' + i },\n '第',\n loadTimes,\n '次加载，当前是第',\n i + 1,\n '条数据'\n ));\n }\n\n me.setState({\n lines: lines,\n loadState: 'loaded'\n });\n } else {\n me.setState({\n loadState: 'noMore'\n });\n }\n }, 1000);\n }\n }, {\n key: 'render',\n value: function render() {\n var me = this;\n\n var props = {\n status: '加载中',\n noMoreText: '没有更多'\n };\n\n return React.createElement(\n 'div',\n { className: 'demo-content' },\n me.state.lines,\n React.createElement(LoadMore, props)\n );\n }\n }]);\n\n return id=\"props\">Props</h2><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>status</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&#39;loaded&#39;</td>\n<td>表示加载状态。&#39;loaded&#39;表示加载完成，待下次加载；&#39;loading&#39;表示加载中；&#39;noMore&#39;表示没有更多</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>className</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&#39;&#39;</td>\n<td>额外的className</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>trigger</td>\n<td>array</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>[&#39;view&#39;, &#39;click&#39;]</td>\n<td>触发加载回调的途径。view表示看到即触发；click表示点击触发</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onLoadMore</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>required</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>加载回调, 需要在该方法中手动控制status改变</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>viewLoadDelay</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>150</td>\n<td>如果trigger包含&#39;view&#39;，那么滚动停止后触发onLoadMore的延迟，单位毫秒</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>locale</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&#39;zh-cn&#39;</td>\n<td>语言，另可选&#39;en-us&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>loadText</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>加载更多文案，可手动设置覆盖默认文案</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>loadingText</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>加载中文案，可手动设置覆盖默认文案</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>noMoreText</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>没有数据文案，可手动设置覆盖默认文案</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a strict';\n\nvar _createClass = function () { function defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if (\"value\" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } } return function (Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }; }();\n\nfunction _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError(\"Cannot call a class as a function\"); } }\n\nfunction _possibleConstructorReturn(self, call) { if (!self) { throw new ReferenceError(\"this hasn't been initialised - super() hasn't been called\"); } return call && (typeof call === \"object\" || typeof call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, configurable: true } }); if (superClass) Object.setPrototypeOf ? Object.setPrototypeOf(subClass, superClass) : subClass.__proto__ = superClass; }\n\nvar Matrix = require('uxcore-matrix');\n\nvar data = {\n data: [{ x: 0, y: 0, row: 2, col: 2, text: '1' }, { x: 2, src=\"https://gw.alicdn.com/tps/TB1Mi1ULXXXXXXQXVXXXXXXXXXX-430-173.png\" alt=\"demo\"></p>\n<h2 id=\"何时使用\">何时使用</h2><p>出现大量跨行跨列的非常规表格的情况下</p>\n<h2 id=\"props\">Props</h2><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>Name</th>\n<th>Type</th>\n<th>Required</th>\n<th>Default</th>\n<th>Comments</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>prefixCls</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>no</td>\n<td>&#39;kuma-matrix&#39;</td>\n<td>类名前缀，不想使用 kuma 主题时使用</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>className</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>no</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>额外类名</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>width</td>\n<td>number/string</td>\n<td>no</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>矩阵宽度，不指定时根据单元格宽度计算得出</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>height</td>\n<td>number/string</td>\n<td>no</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>矩阵高度，不指定时根据单元格高度计算得出</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>cellHeight</td>\n<td>number/string/array</td>\n<td>no</td>\n<td>40</td>\n<td>单元格高度，也可以是一个数组，指定每行单元格的高度，如果数组长度不够，将取第一个行的高度</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>cellWidth</td>\n<td>number/string/array</td>\n<td>no</td>\n<td>100</td>\n<td>单元格宽度，也可以是一个数组，指定每列单元格的宽度，如果数组长度不够，将取第一个列的宽度</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>render</td>\n<td>func(cellData)</td>\n<td>no</td>\n<td>(cell) =&gt; cell.text</td>\n<td>指定每个单元格的渲染方式</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>data</td>\n<td>object</td>\n<td>yes</td>\n<td>{}</td>\n<td>数据源，格式见下方</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h2 id=\"data-structure\">Data structure</h2><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">{\n data: [\n <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// x,y 表示单元格相对左上角的偏移量，单位为1个单元格</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// row, col 代表跨行跨列的数量，分别代表纵向跨行，和横向跨列</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// text 是默认用来显示的字段</span>\n { x: <span class=\"hljs-number\">0</span>, y: <span class=\"hljs-number\">0</span>, row: <span 100);\n}\n\nfunction personDataFormatter(data) {\n data.forEach(function (item) {\n item.displayName = item.name + (item.nickNameCn ? '(' + item.nickNameCn + ')' : '');\n });\n return data;\n}\n\nfunction personMentionFormatter(data) {\n return '@' + data.name + '(' + data.emplId + ')';\n}\n\nfunction personPanelFormatter(data) {\n class=\"hljs-string\">`(<span class=\"hljs-subst\">${item.nickNameCn}</span>)`</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\">''</span>);\n });\n <span class=\"hljs-keyword\">return</span> data;\n}\n\n<span class=\"hljs-keyword\">return</span> <span class=\"hljs-string\">`@<span class=\"hljs-subst\">${data.name}</span>(<span class=\"hljs-subst\">${data.emplId}</span>)`</span>;\n}\n\n<span class=\"hljs-function\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\">function</span> <span class=\"hljs-title\">personPanelFormatter</span>(<span class=\"hljs-params\">data</span>)</span>{\n <span class=\"hljs-keyword\">return</span> <span class=\"hljs-string\">`&lt;img src=\"<span class=\"hljs-subst\">${data.avatar}</span>\" width=\"25\" height=\"25\" title=\"<span class=\"hljs-subst\">${data.name}</span>\"&gt;<span class=\"hljs-subst\">${data.displayName}</span> - <span class=\"hljs-subst\">${data.emplId}</span>`</span>;\n}\n\nReactDOM.render(\n <span class=\"xml\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">TinymceMention</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">insertMode</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">{'TEXT_NODE'}</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">source</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">{getPersonData}</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">formatter</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">{personDataFormatter}</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">mentionFormatter</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">{personMentionFormatter}</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">panelFormatter</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">{personPanelFormatter}</span>&gt;</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">Tinymce</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">placeholder</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">{'在此编辑'}</span> /&gt;</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">TinymceMention</span>&gt;</span>,\n document.getElementById('components-mention-demo-tinymce')\n);</span></code></pre></div>"},"status":"public","toc":""},"site/components/mention/index.md":{"title":"Mention","id":"components-mention-index","tags":{"author":{"name":"vincent.bian"}},"filepath":"site/components/mention/index.md","directory":"components/mention","filename":"index","meta":{"title":"Mention","description":"\n","category":"Components","chinese":"At组件","order":"9","subtype":"Other","filepath":"site/components/mention/index.md","filename":"index","directory":"components/mention","id":"components-mention-index","template":"components","html":"<p>编辑框内at任何对象</p>\n<h2 id=\"api\">API</h2><h3 id=\"mention\">Mention</h3><ul>\n<li>formatter(arr): format the data form source.</li>\n<li>panelFormatter(obj): customize the panel display.</li>\n<li>onChange(e, value): onChange事件。</li>\n</ul>\n<h3 id=\"tinymcemention\">TinymceMention</h3><ul>\n<li>formatter(arr): format the data form source.</li>\n<li>panelFormatter(obj): customize the panel display.</li>\n<li>mentionFormatter(obj): customize the insert content with this function.</li>\n<li>onChange(e, value): Callback invoked when the editor&#39;s content has been changed.</li>\n<li>onAdd(display, originData): Callback invoked when a mention has been added.</li>\n</ul>\n<h3 id=\"contenteditableeditor\">ContentEditableEditor</h3><ul>\n<li>mentionFormatter(obj): customize the insert content with this function.</li>\n<li>onChange(e, value): Callback invoked when the editor&#39;s content has been changed.</li>\n<li>onAdd(display, originData): Callback invoked when a mention has been added.</li>\n</ul>\n<h3 id=\"textareaeditor\">TextareaEditor</h3><ul>\n<li>mentionFormatter(obj): customize the insert content with this function.</li>\n<li>onChange(e, value): Callback invoked when the editor&#39;s content has been changed.</li>\n<li>onAdd(display, originData): Callback invoked when a mention has been added.</li>\n</ul>\n<h3 id=\"inputeditor\">InputEditor</h3><ul>\n<li>mentionFormatter(obj): customize the insert content with this function.</li>\n<li>onChange(e, value): Callback invoked when the editor&#39;s content has been changed.</li>\n<li>onAdd(display, originData): Callback invoked when a mention has been added.</li>\n</ul>\n<h2 id=\"props\">props</h2><h3 id=\"mention\">Mention</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>name</th>\n<th>Description</th>\n<th>Type</th>\n<th>Default</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>prefixCls</td>\n<td>class prefix</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>kuma-mention</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>source</td>\n<td>data source for mention content</td>\n<td>array or function</td>\n<td>[]</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>delay</td>\n<td>debounce of the request to data source</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>100</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>matchRange</td>\n<td>only match the string after delimiter which the length in this range</td>\n<td>array</td>\n<td>[2, 8]</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>formatter</td>\n<td>format the data form source</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>panelFormatter</td>\n<td>customize the panel display</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onChange</td>\n<td>trigger when editor content change</td>\n<td>function(e, value)</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 originData)</td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>insertMode</td>\n<td><code>ELEMENT_NODE</code> will insert mention content with a button, <code>TEXT_NODE</code> will insert with a text node</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td><code>ELEMENT_NODE</code> or <code>TEXT_NODE</code></td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 strict';\n\nvar _createClass = function () { function defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if (\"value\" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } } return function (Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }; }();\n\nfunction _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError(\"Cannot call a class as a function\"); } }\n\nfunction _possibleConstructorReturn(self, call) { if (!self) { throw new ReferenceError(\"this hasn't been initialised - super() hasn't been called\"); } return call && (typeof call === \"object\" || typeof call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, configurable: true } }); if (superClass) Object.setPrototypeOf ? Object.setPrototypeOf(subClass, superClass) : subClass.__proto__ = superClass; }\n\nvar Menu = require('uxcore-menu');\nvar SubMenu = Menu.SubMenu;\nvar MenuItem = Menu.Item;\n\nfunction handleClick(e) {\n console.log('click', e);\n}\n\nvar Demo = function (_React$Component) {\n _inherits(Demo, _React$Component);\n\n function Demo(props) {\n _classCallCheck(this, Demo);\n\n var _this = _possibleConstructorReturn(this, (Demo.__proto__ || Object.getPrototypeOf(Demo)).call(this, props));\n\n _this.state = {\n current: '1',\n openKeys: []\n };\n return _this;\n }\n\n _createClass(Demo, [{\n key: 'handleClick',\n value: function handleClick(e) {\n console.log('click ', e);\n this.setState({\n current: e.key,\n openKeys: e.keyPath.slice(1)\n });\n }\n }, {\n key: 'onToggle',\n value: function onToggle(info) {\n this.setState({\n openKeys: info.openKeys\n });\n }\n }, {\n key: 'render',\n value: function render() {\n return React.createElement(\n Menu,\n { onClick: this.handleClick.bind(this),\n style: { width: 240 },\n openKeys: this.state.openKeys,\n onOpen: this.onToggle.bind(this),\n onClose: this.onToggle.bind(this),\n selectedKeys: [this.state.current],\n mode: 'inline' },\n React.createElement(\n SubMenu,\n { key: 'sub1', title: React.createElement(\n 'span',\n null,\n React.createElement('i', { className: 'kuma-icon kuma-icon-wangwang' }),\n React.createElement(\n 'span',\n null,\n '导航一'\n )\n ) },\n React.createElement(\n Menu.Item,\n { key: '1' },\n '选项1'\n ),\n React.createElement(\n Menu.Item,\n { key: '2' strict';\n\nvar _createClass = function () { function defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if (\"value\" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } } return function (Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }; }();\n\nfunction _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError(\"Cannot call a class as a function\"); } }\n\nfunction _possibleConstructorReturn(self, call) { if (!self) { throw new ReferenceError(\"this hasn't been initialised - super() hasn't been called\"); } return call && (typeof call === \"object\" || typeof call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, configurable: true } }); if (superClass) Object.setPrototypeOf ? Object.setPrototypeOf(subClass, superClass) : subClass.__proto__ = superClass; }\n\nvar Menu = require('uxcore-menu');\nvar SubMenu = Menu.SubMenu;\nvar MenuItem = Menu.Item;\n\nfunction id=\"api\">API</h2><h2 id=\"props\">Props</h2><h3 id=\"menu\">Menu</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>说明</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>mode</td>\n<td>菜单类型</td>\n<td>enum &#39;vertical&#39;, &#39;horizontal&#39;, &#39;inline&#39;</td>\n<td>vertical</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>selectedKeys</td>\n<td>当前选中的菜单项 key 数组</td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>defaultSelectedKeys</td>\n<td>初始选中的菜单项 key 数组</td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>openKeys</td>\n<td>当前展开的菜单项 key 数组</td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>defaultOpenKeys</td>\n<td>初始展开的菜单项 key 数组</td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onSelect</td>\n<td>被选中时调用，参数 {item, key, selectedKeys} 对象</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onDeselect</td>\n<td>取消选中时调用，参数 {item, key, selectedKeys} 对象，仅在 multiple 生效</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onClick</td>\n<td>点击 menuitem 调用此函数，参数为 {item, key}</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>style</td>\n<td>根节点样式</td>\n<td>object</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"menu-item\">Menu.Item</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>说明</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>disabled</td>\n<td>是否禁用</td>\n<td>Boolean</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>key</td>\n<td>item 的唯一标志</td>\n<td>String</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"menu-submenu\">Menu.SubMenu</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>说明</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>title</td>\n<td>子菜单项值</td>\n<td>String or React.Element</td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>children</td>\n<td>(MenuItem or SubMenu)[]</td>\n<td>子菜单的菜单项</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a strict';\n\nvar _createClass = function () { function defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if (\"value\" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } } return function (Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }; }();\n\nfunction _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError(\"Cannot call a class as a function\"); } }\n\nfunction _possibleConstructorReturn(self, call) { if (!self) { throw new ReferenceError(\"this hasn't been initialised - super() hasn't been called\"); } return call && (typeof call === \"object\" || typeof call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, configurable: true } }); if (superClass) Object.setPrototypeOf ?
