Object.getPrototypeOf(Demo)).call(this, props));\n\n _this.state = {};\n return _this;\n }\n\n _createClass(Demo, [{\n key: 'handleClick',\n value: function handleClick(type) {\n Message[type](\"这是一个 \" + type);\n }\n }, {\n key: 'render',\n value: function render() {\n var me = this;\n return React.createElement(\n 'div',\n { className: 'demo1' },\n React.createElement(\n Button,\n { onClick: me.handleClick.bind(me, 'success') },\n '显示成功提示'\n ),\n React.createElement(\n Button,\n { onClick: me.handleClick.bind(me, 'info') },\n '显示普通提示'\n ),\n React.createElement(\n Button,\n { onClick: me.handleClick.bind(me, 'error') },\n '显示错误提示'\n ),\n React.createElement(\n Button,\n { onClick: me.handleClick.bind(me, 'loading') },\n '显示加载提示'\n )\n );\n }\n }]);\n\n return Demo;\n}(React.Component);\n\n;\nReactDOM.render(React.createElement(Demo, null), document.getElementById('components-message-demo-basic'));\n\n/* JS END CSS START*/})()</script><div id=\"api\">API</h2><ul>\n<li>Message.success(content, duration)</li>\n<li>Message.error(content, duration)</li>\n<li>Message.info(content, duration)</li>\n<li>Message.loading(content, duration)</li>\n</ul>\n<table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>参数</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>content</td>\n<td>React.Element or String</td>\n<td>required</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>提示的内容</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>duration</td>\n<td>Number</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>1.5</td>\n<td>多长(秒)时间消失</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<p>另外提供了一个全局方法用于配置 </p>\n<div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">Message.config({\n className: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'xxx'</span>, <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 在 uxcore-kuma 样式基础上定制时使用</span>\n Control","chinese":"复选择器","filepath":"site/components/multi-select/index.md","filename":"index","directory":"components/multi-select","id":"components-multi-select-index","template":"components","html":"<h2 id=\"props\">Props</h2><h3 id=\"mulitselect\">MulitSelect</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>value</td>\n<td>array</td>\n<td>required</td>\n<td>[]</td>\n<td>由 value 组成的数组，与 React 受限组件表现一致，选中项与 value 保持一致，数组中的值与 item 的 value 相对应</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onChange</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>required</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>与 React 受限组件表现一致，在 checkbox 群发生改变时触发，借此来更改 value</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>disabled</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td>是否为 disable 状态</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>className</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&#39;&#39;</td>\n<td>选择框的classname</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>dropdownClassName</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&#39;&#39;</td>\n<td>下拉框的classname</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>placeholder</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&#39;&#39;</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>titleBreakStr</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&#39;、&#39;</td>\n<td>选中选项在选择框中的链接符</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>optionLabelProp</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&#39;text&#39;</td>\n<td>item中的哪一个prop作为选项展示的label</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>maxSelect</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>最多可选选项数量</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showSelectAll</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>是否显示全选按钮(如果maxSelect小于实际数量则该按钮成为disabled状态)</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showClear</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>是否显示清空按钮</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onSubmit</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>点击确认时的回调函数，返回valueList数组和labelList数组</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"mulitselectitem\">MulitSelectItem</h3><blockquote>\n<p>通过 MulitSelect.Item 取得。实际prop与checkboxGroup.Item相同</p>\n</blockquote>\n<table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>text</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optinal</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>checkbox 后面跟着的说明文字</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>value</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>required</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>checkbox 对应的值</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a href=\"#props\">Props</a><ul><li><a href=\"#mulitselect\">MulitSelect</a></li><li><a href=\"#mulitselectitem\">MulitSelectItem</a></li></ul></ul>"},"site/components/pagination/demo/basic.md":{"title":"基本","id":"components-pagination-demo-basic","tags":[],"filepath":"site/components/pagination/demo/basic.md","directory":"components/pagination/demo","filename":"basic","meta":{"title":"基本","description":"\n<p>基础分页。</p>\n","order":"0","filepath":"site/components/pagination/demo/basic.md","filename":"basic","directory":"components/pagination/demo","id":"components-pagination-demo-basic","template":"demos","html":"<script>(function(){'use id=\"何时使用\">何时使用</h2><ul>\n<li>当加载/渲染所有数据将花费很多时间时；</li>\n<li>可切换页码浏览数据。</li>\n</ul>\n<h2 id=\"api\">API</h2><h3 id=\"pagination\">Pagination</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>参数</th>\n<th>说明</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>current</td>\n<td>当前页数</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>1</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>total</td>\n<td>数据总数</td>\n<td>number/jsx</td>\n<td>0</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>pageSize</td>\n<td>每页条数</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>10</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onChange</td>\n<td>页码改变的回调，参数是改变后的页码</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showSizeChanger</td>\n<td>是否可以改变 pageSize</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onShowSizeChange</td>\n<td>pageSize 变化的回调</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showQuickJump</td>\n<td>是否可以快速跳转至某页</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>className</td>\n<td>当为「mini」时，是小尺寸分页</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>simple</td>\n<td>当添加该属性时，显示为简单分页</td>\n<td>object</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, Control","chinese":"筛选器","filepath":"site/components/pickable/index.md","filename":"index","directory":"components/pickable","id":"components-pickable-index","template":"components","html":"<h2 id=\"props\">Props</h2><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>prefixCls</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>kuma-pickable</td>\n<td>类名前缀，不使用 kuma 主题时使用</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>className</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>required</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>增加额外的class</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onChange</td>\n<td>func(value, changedKeys)</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>选中情况变化时触发，返回选中的项，以及目前发生变动的值</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>value</td>\n<td>array</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>是否有清除按钮</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>max</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>99</td>\n<td>最大显示的数字，超过 max，显示 max+</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>type</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>normal</td>\n<td>样式风格，可选值为<code>normal</code>,<code>simple</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>multiple</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>是否支持多选</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h2 Props</h2><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>value</td>\n<td>string/number</td>\n<td>required</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>该 Item 对应的值</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>disabled</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td>是否禁用</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>number strict';\n\nvar Select = require('uxcore-select2');\nvar Option = Select.Option;\n\nvar Test = React.createClass({\n displayName: 'Test',\n getInitialState: function getInitialState() {\n return {\n options: []\n };\n },\n handleChange: function handleChange(value) {\n var options;\n if (!value || value.indexOf('@') >= 0) {\n options = [];\n } else {\n options = ['gmail.com', '163.com', 'qq.com'].map(function (domain) {\n var email = value + '@' + domain;\n return React.createElement(\n Option,\n { key: email },\n email\n );\n });\n }\n this.setState({\n options: options\n });\n },\n render: function render() {\n return React.createElement(\n Select,\n { combobox: true,\n style: { width: 200 },\n onChange: this.handleChange,\n searchPlaceholder: '请输入账户名' },\n this.state.options\n );\n }\n});\n\nReactDOM.render(React.createElement(Test, null), document.getElementById('components-select2-demo-combobox'));})()</script><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\"><span strict';\n\nvar Select = require('uxcore-select2');\nvar Option = Select.Option;\n\n\nvar provinceData = ['浙江', '江苏'];\nvar cityData = {\n '浙江': ['杭州', '宁波', '温州'],\n '江苏': ['南京', '苏州', '镇江']\n};\n\nvar App = React.createClass({\n displayName: 'App',\n getInitialState: function getInitialState() {\n return {\n cities: cityData[provinceData[0]],\n secondCity: cityData[provinceData[0]][0]\n };\n },\n handleProvinceChange: function handleProvinceChange(value) {\n this.setState({\n cities: cityData[value],\n secondCity: cityData[value][0]\n });\n },\n onSecondCityChange: function onSecondCityChange(value) {\n this.setState({\n secondCity: value\n });\n },\n render: function render() {\n var provinceOptions = provinceData.map(function (province) {\n return React.createElement(\n Option,\n { key: province },\n province\n );\n });\n var cityOptions = this.state.cities.map(function (city) {\n return React.createElement(\n Option,\n { key: city },\n city\n );\n });\n return React.createElement(\n 'div',\n null,\n React.createElement(\n Select,\n { defaultValue: provinceData[0], style: { width: 150 }, onChange: this.handleProvinceChange },\n provinceOptions\n ),\n ' ',\n React.createElement(\n Select,\n { value: this.state.secondCity, style: { width: 150 }, onChange: this.onSecondCityChange },\n cityOptions\n )\n );\n }\n});\n\nReactDOM.render(React.createElement(App, null), document.getElementById('components-select2-demo-coordinate'));})()</script><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\"><span i.toString(36) + i },\n i.toString(36) + i\n ));\n}\n\nfunction handleChange(value) {\n console.log('selected ' + value);\n}\n\nReactDOM.render(React.createElement(\n Select,\n {\n style: { width: 400 Control","filepath":"site/components/select2/index.md","filename":"index","directory":"components/select2","id":"components-select2-index","template":"components","html":"<p>类似 Select2 的选择器。</p>\n<h2 id=\"何时使用\">何时使用</h2><p>弹出一个下拉菜单给用户选择操作，用于代替原生的选择器，或者需要一个更优雅的多选器时。</p>\n<div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"xml\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">Select</span>&gt;</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">Option</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">value</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"lucy\"</span>&gt;</span>lucy<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">Option</span>&gt;</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">Select</span>&gt;</span></code></pre></div><h2 id=\"props\">Props</h2><h3 id=\"select-props\">Select props</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>参数</th>\n<th>说明</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>value</td>\n<td>指定当前选中的条目</td>\n<td>string/Array</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>defaultValue</td>\n<td>指定默认选中的条目</td>\n<td>string/Array</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>multiple</td>\n<td>支持多选</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>filterOption</td>\n<td>是否根据输入项进行筛选</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>true</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>tags</td>\n<td>可以把随意输入的条目作为tag，输入项不需要与下拉选项匹配</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onSelect</td>\n<td>被选中时调用，参数为选中的option value值</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onDeselect</td>\n<td>取消选中时调用，参数为选中的option value值，仅在multiple或tags模式下生效</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onChange</td>\n<td>选中option，或input的value变化(combobox模式下)时，调用此函数</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>allowClear</td>\n<td>显示清除按钮</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>placeholder</td>\n<td>选择框默认文字</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>searchPlaceholder</td>\n<td>搜索框默认文字</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>optionFilterProp</td>\n<td>输入项过滤对应的 option 属性</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>value</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>combobox</td>\n<td>输入框自动提示模式</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>size</td>\n<td>选择框大小</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>optionLabelProp</td>\n<td>选择 Option 的哪个 prop 作为选择框中的显示。</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>&#39;children&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>getPopupContainer</td>\n<td>弹出的菜单渲染在哪个容器中</td>\n<td>function(trigger:Node):Node</td>\n<td>function(){return document.body;}</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>dropdownMatchSelectWidth</td>\n<td>dropdown 部分是否和 select 部分同宽</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>true</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>dropdownClassName</td>\n<td>dropdown 部分的定制类名</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>notFoundContent</td>\n<td>未找到选项时的提示文案</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>not found</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showSearch</td>\n<td>显示搜索框</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>true</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"option-props\">Option props</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>参数</th>\n<th>说明</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>disabled</td>\n<td>是否禁用</td>\n<td>Boolean</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>key</td>\n<td>如果react需要你设置此项，此项值与value的值相同，然后可以省略value设置</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>value</td>\n<td>默认根据此属性值进行筛选</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"optgroup-props\">OptGroup props</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>参数</th>\n<th>说明</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>label</td>\n<td>组名</td>\n<td>String/React.Element</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>key</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a strict';\n\nvar _createClass = function () { function defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if (\"value\" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } } return function (Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }; }();\n\nvar _uxcoreSteps = require('uxcore-steps');\n\nvar _uxcoreSteps2 = _interopRequireDefault(_uxcoreSteps);\n\nvar _uxcoreButton = require('uxcore-button');\n\nvar _uxcoreButton2 = _interopRequireDefault(_uxcoreButton);\n\nfunction _interopRequireDefault(obj) { return obj && obj.__esModule ? obj : { default: obj }; }\n\nfunction _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError(\"Cannot call a class as a function\"); } }\n\nfunction _possibleConstructorReturn(self, call) { if (!self) { throw new ReferenceError(\"this hasn't been initialised - super() hasn't been called\"); } return call && (typeof call === \"object\" || typeof call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, configurable: true } }); if (superClass) Object.setPrototypeOf ? Object.setPrototypeOf(subClass, superClass) : subClass.__proto__ = superClass; }\n\nvar array = Array.apply(null, Array(Math.floor(Math.random() * 3) + 3));\nvar steps = array.map(function (item, i) {\n return {\n title: '步骤' + (i + 1)\n };\n});\n\nvar Demo = function (_React$Component) {\n _inherits(Demo, _React$Component);\n\n function Demo(props) {\n _classCallCheck(this, Demo);\n\n var _this = _possibleConstructorReturn(this, (Demo.__proto__ || Object.getPrototypeOf(Demo)).call(this, props));\n\n _this.state = {\n currentStep: Math.floor(Math.random() * steps.length),\n showIcon: true\n };\n return _this;\n }\n\n _createClass(Demo, [{\n key: 'toggleNumberShow',\n value: function toggleNumberShow() {\n this.setState({\n showIcon: !this.state.showIcon\n });\n }\n }, {\n key: 'next',\n value: function next() {\n var s = this.state.currentStep + 1;\n if (s === steps.length) {\n s = 0;\n }\n this.setState({\n currentStep: s\n });\n }\n }, {\n key: 'render',\n value: function render() {\n return React.createElement(\n 'div',\n null,\n React.createElement(\n 'div',\n null,\n '当前正在执行第 ',\n this.state.currentStep + 1,\n ' 步'\n ),\n React.createElement(\n _uxcoreSteps2.default,\n { current: this.state.currentStep, showIcon: this.state.showIcon },\n steps.map(function (s, i) {\n return React.createElement(_uxcoreSteps.Step, { key: i, title: s.title, description: s.description });\n })\n ),\n React.createElement(\n 'div',\n null,\n React.createElement(\n _uxcoreButton2.default,\n { size: 'small', type: 'secondary', onClick: this.next.bind(this) },\n '下一步'\n ),\n '  ',\n React.createElement(\n _uxcoreButton2.default,\n { size: 'small', type: 'secondary', onClick: this.toggleNumberShow.bind(this) },\n '显示数字'\n )\n )\n );\n }\n }]);\n\n return Demo;\n}(React.Component);\n\nReactDOM.render(React.createElement(Demo, null), document.getElementById('components-steps-demo-dynamic'));})()</script><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">import Steps, { Step } from 'uxcore-steps';\nimport Button from 'uxcore-button';\n\nlet array = Array.apply(null, Array(Math.floor(Math.random() * 3) + 3));\nlet steps = array.map(function(item, i) {\n return {\n title: '步骤' + (i + 1)\n };\n});\n\nclass Demo extends React.Component {\n\n constructor(props){\n super(props);\n this.state = {\n currentStep: Math.floor(Math.random() * steps.length),\n showIcon: true\n };\n }\n\n toggleNumberShow(){\n this.setState({\n showIcon: !this.state.showIcon\n });\n }\n\n next() {\n var s = this.state.currentStep + 1;\n if (s === steps.length) {\n s = 0;\n }\n this.setState({\n currentStep: s\n });\n }\n\n render() {\n return (\n &lt;div&gt;\n &lt;div&gt;当前正在执行第 {this.state.currentStep + 1} 步&lt;/div&gt;\n &lt;Steps current={this.state.currentStep} showIcon={this.state.showIcon}&gt;\n {steps.map((s, i) =&gt; &lt;Step key={i} title={s.title} description={s.description} /&gt;)}\n &lt;/Steps&gt;\n &lt;div&gt;\n &lt;Button size=\"small\" type=\"secondary\" onClick={this.next.bind(this)}&gt;下一步&lt;/Button&gt; &amp;nbsp;\n &lt;Button size=\"small\" type=\"secondary\" onClick={this.toggleNumberShow.bind(this)}&gt;显示数字&lt;/Button&gt;\n &lt;/div&gt;\n &lt;/div&gt;\n );\n }\n}\n\nReactDOM.render(\n &lt;Demo /&gt;\n, id=\"api\">API</h2><h2 id=\"props\">Props</h2><h3 id=\"steps\">Steps</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>说明</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>可选值</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>current</td>\n<td>可选参数，指定当前处理正在执行状态的步骤，从0开始记数。在子Step元素中，可以通过status属性覆盖状态。</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>无</td>\n<td>0</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>direction</td>\n<td>可选参数，指定步骤条方向（目前支持水平和竖直两种方向，默认水平方向）。</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>vertical</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>maxDescriptionWidth</td>\n<td>可选参数，指定步骤的详细描述文字的最大宽度。</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>无</td>\n<td>100</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showIcon</td>\n<td>步骤节点是否显示图标或数字</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td><code>true</code> or <code>false</code></td>\n<td>true</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>type</td>\n<td>步骤条类型</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td><code>default</code> <code>title-on-top</code> or <code>long-desc</code></td>\n<td><code>default</code></td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"steps-step\">Steps.Step</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>说明</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>可选值</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>status</td>\n<td>可选参数，指定状态。当不配置该属性时，会使用父Steps元素的current来自动指定状态。</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>wait, process, finish</td>\n<td>wait</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>title</td>\n<td>必要参数，标题。</td>\n<td>string/jsx</td>\n<td>无</td>\n<td>无</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>description</td>\n<td>可选参数，步骤的详情描述。</td>\n<td>string/jsx</td>\n<td>无</td>\n<td>空</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>icon</td>\n<td>可选参数，步骤的Icon。如果不指定，则使用默认的样式。</td>\n<td>string/jsx</td>\n<td>无</td>\n<td>空</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a class=\"hljs-title\">Demo</span> /&gt;</span>, document.getElementById('components-table-demo-tree'))</span></code></pre></div>"},"status":"public","toc":""},"site/components/table/index.md":{"title":"Table","id":"components-table-index","tags":{"author":{"name":"zhouquan.yezq"}},"filepath":"site/components/table/index.md","directory":"components/table","filename":"index","meta":{"title":"Table","description":"\n","category":"Components","chinese":"表格","order":"6","subtype":"Matrix","filepath":"site/components/table/index.md","filename":"index","directory":"components/table","id":"components-table-index","template":"components","html":"<h2 id=\"api\">API</h2><h3 id=\"行内编辑用\">行内编辑用</h3><ul>\n<li>getData(): 返回表格的数据，并作校验。</li>\n<li>addEmptyRow(): 添加一个空的新行。</li>\n<li>addRow(rowData): 以指定数据添加一个新行。</li>\n<li>delRow(rowData): 删除一个新行。</li>\n<li>editRow(rowData): 使指定的行切换到编辑模式。</li>\n<li>editAllRow(): 使所有行切换到编辑模式。</li>\n<li>viewRow(rowData): 使指定的行切换到查看模式。</li>\n<li>saveRow(rowData): 保存行的数据(同时切换至查看模式)。</li>\n<li>saveAllRow(): 保存所有行的数据(同时切换至查看模式)。</li>\n<li>resetRow(rowData): 重置行到数据（若保存过，则为保存过后的数据）。</li>\n</ul>\n<h3 id=\"获取数据\">获取数据</h3><ul>\n<li>fetchData(from): 使表格重新请求一次数据。<ul>\n<li>@param from {string} {optional}: 这个参数会传入到 beforeFetch 的回调中。</li>\n</ul>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<h3 id=\"其他\">其他</h3><ul>\n<li>toggleSubComp(rowData): 使指定的行显示或隐藏二级组件(subComp)。</li>\n</ul>\n<h2 id=\"props\">Props</h2><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>Name</th>\n<th>Type</th>\n<th>Require</th>\n<th>Default</th>\n<th>Since Ver.</th>\n<th>Note</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxcolumns</td>\n<td>array</td>\n<td>required</td>\n<td>null</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>表格列配置项，具体见<a href=\"#jsxcolumns\">这里</a></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>width</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>1000</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>表格的宽度</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>height</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>100%</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>表格的高度</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showColumnPicker</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>是否显示列筛选按钮</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showPager</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>是否显示分页</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showPagerTotal</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td>1.3.17</td>\n<td>是否显示分页的总数部分</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showPagerSizeChanger</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>1.6.9</td>\n<td>是否可以改变分页的pageSize</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>isMiniPager</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>1.6.9</td>\n<td>分页是否是mini的</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showHeader</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>是否显示表格头部</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showHeaderBorder</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td>1.3.6</td>\n<td>是否显示头部列之间的分割线</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showMask</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>是否在 loading 的时候显示蒙层</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showSearch</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>是否显示内置的搜索栏</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>doubleClickToEdit</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>是否开启双击编辑</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>fetchDataOnMount</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>1.3.18</td>\n<td>是否在组件 Mount 时立刻获取一次数据</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>rowSelector</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>复选</td>\n<td>1.3.20</td>\n<td>行选择是复选还是单选，支持 checkboxSelector 和 radioSelector</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>locale</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>zh-cn</td>\n<td>1.3.17</td>\n<td>国家化，目前支持 zh-cn/en-us</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>emptyText</td>\n<td>string or element</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;暂无数据&quot;</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>当没有数据时 Table 展示的文案</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>searchBarPlaceholder</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;搜索表格内容&quot;</td>\n<td>1.3.0</td>\n<td>searchBar 的占位符</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>loadingText</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;loading&quot;</td>\n<td>1.4.4</td>\n<td>加载数据时的文案</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>headerHeight</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>40</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>表格头部的高度</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>pageSize</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>10</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>每页显示多少条数据</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>pagerSizeOptions</td>\n<td>array</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>[10,20,30,40]</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>显示的可选 pageSize</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>queryKeys</td>\n<td>array</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>[]</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>有哪些数据会传递给 subComp</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>jsxdata</td>\n<td>object</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>在远端数据还没有返回时用作默认数据</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>fetchUrl</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;&quot;</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>表格的数据源</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>fetchParams</td>\n<td>object</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>表格在请求数据时，会额外附带的参数，具有最高的优先级</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>actionBar</td>\n<td>object/array</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>null</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>表格内置的操作条配置，详细<a href=\"#actionbar\">见此</a></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>beforeFetch</td>\n<td>function(data, from)</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>两个参数，data 表示表格请求数据时即将发送的参数，from 表示这次请求数据的行为从哪里产生，内置的有 <code>search</code>(搜索栏),<code>order</code>(排序) &amp; <code>pagination</code>(分页)，该函数需要返回值，返回值为真正请求所携带的参数。</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>processData</td>\n<td>function(data)</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>有时源返回的数据格式，并不符合 Table 的要求，可以通过此函数进行调整，参数 data 是返回数据中 content 字段的 value，该函数需要返回值，返回值为符合 content 字段 value 的数据结构。</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onFetchError</td>\n<td>function(result)</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>1.3.7</td>\n<td>在返回数据中 success 不是 true 的情况下触发，返回所有请求得到的数据</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onSearch</td>\n<td>function(searchTxt)</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>1.6.1</td>\n<td>未配置 fetchUrl 的情况下触发，传回搜索的关键词</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onOrder</td>\n<td>function(column, orderType)</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>1.6.1</td>\n<td>未配置 fetchUrl 的情况下触发，传回排序的列和排序方式</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onPagerChange</td>\n<td>function(current, pageSize)</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>1.6.1</td>\n<td>未配置 fetchUrl 的情况下触发，传回要到达的分页和每页条数</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>addRowClassName</td>\n<td>function(rowData)</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>用于为特定的某几行添加特殊的 class，用于样式定制</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>rowSelection</td>\n<td>object</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>选中复选框时触发的回调，rowSelection 是由回调函数组成的对象，包括 onSelect 和 onSelectAll，例子见此</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"折叠展开专用\">折叠展开专用</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>Name</th>\n<th>Type</th>\n<th>Require</th>\n<th>Since Ver.</th>\n<th>Default</th>\n<th>Note</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>SubComp</td>\n<td>React Element</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>传入二级组件，已废弃，请使用 renderSubComp, 自 1.7.0 版本后不再保证此部分功能的完整性。</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>renderSubComp</td>\n<td>function(rowData)</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>1.3.15</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>传入二级组件，该函数需要返回值，返回 false，表示不渲染二级，返回 jsx，则渲染该 jsx</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"tree-模式专用\">Tree 模式专用</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>Name</th>\n<th>Type</th>\n<th>Require</th>\n<th>Since Ver.</th>\n<th>Default</th>\n<th>Note</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>renderModel</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>&#39;&#39;</td>\n<td>使用 tree 模式时，此项为 &#39;tree&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>levels</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>1</td>\n<td>tree 模式默认展开的级数</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"行内编辑表格专用\">行内编辑表格专用</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>Name</th>\n<th>Type</th>\n<th>Require</th>\n<th>Since Ver.</th>\n<th>Default</th>\n<th>Note</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>onChange</td>\n<td>function(data)</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>有表格编辑行为触发，参数的数据格式为 {data: 表格的所有数据, changedData: 变动行的数据, dataKey: xxx, editKey: xxx, pass: 正在编辑的域是否通过校验}</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>getSavedData</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>onChange 中的数据是否是保存之后的数据(通过了 saveRow() 的数据)</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"列配置项-jsxcolumns\">列配置项(jsxcolumns)</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>Key Name</th>\n<th>Type</th>\n<th>Since Ver.</th>\n<th>Require</th>\n<th>Note</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>dataKey</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>required</td>\n<td>表格的数据中用于查看模式展示的字段</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>editKey</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>表格的数据中用于编辑模式的字段，如对于 select 来说，此项应为选项里的 key</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>align</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>文字居中方式，默认 &#39;left&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>title</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>required</td>\n<td>列头</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>width</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>required</td>\n<td>列宽</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>hidden</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>是否隐藏，默认为 false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>ordered</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>是否显示内置的排序，默认为 false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>type</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>包含 &#39;money&#39;, &#39;card&#39;, &#39;cnmobile&#39;, &#39;checkboxSelector&#39;, &#39;action&#39;, &#39;radio&#39;, &#39;text&#39;, &#39;select&#39; 和 &#39;custom&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>actions</td>\n<td>array</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>当 type 是 action 的时候会用到，用于定义具体有哪些操作，格式见下方<a href=\"#actions\">说明</a></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>customField</td>\n<td>React Element</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>当 type 是 custom 的时候会用到，用于传入自定义的 Field，用于行内编辑</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>render</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>在查看模式下，用户定制渲染的方式，返回一个 jsx 格式</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>fixed</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>是否为固定列</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>delimiter</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>在 type 是 &#39;money&#39;, &#39;card&#39;, &#39;cnmobile&#39; 的时候会用到，用于传入格式化的分隔符</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>disable</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>在 type 为 checkboxSelector 时使用，是否禁用 checkbox，优先级高于 isDisable</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>isDisable</td>\n<td>function(rowData)</td>\n<td>1.3.1</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>在 tpye 为 checkboxSelector 时使用，为一个回调函数，用于根据 rowData 去判断是否禁用该行的 checkbox</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>canEdit</td>\n<td>function(rowData)</td>\n<td>1.3.3</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>在 type 为可编辑表格的类别时使用，为一个回调函数，用于根据 rowData 去判断该行该列是否可以编辑</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>config</td>\n<td>object</td>\n<td>1.5.0</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>在 type 为 text/select/radio 时使用，传入对应的配置项，配置项支持对应的组件(uxcore-selelct2等)大部分配置</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>renderChildren</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>1.5.0</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>在 type 为 select/radio 时使用，通过返回 jsx 传入选项。</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"列配置项的例子\">列配置项的例子</h3><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">\n<span class=\"hljs-keyword\">let</span> columns = [\n { dataKey: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'check'</span>, type: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'checkbox'</span>, isDisable: <span class=\"hljs-function\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\">function</span>(<span class=\"hljs-params\">rowData</span>) </span>{<span class=\"hljs-keyword\">return</span> <span class=\"hljs-regexp\">/city/</span>.test(rowData.city)}}, <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 定制 checkbox 列，dataKey 对应的应是一个 bool 值，表明是否被选中。</span>\n { dataKey: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'country'</span>, title:<span class=\"hljs-string\">'国家'</span>, width: <span class=\"hljs-number\">200</span>,ordered:<span class=\"hljs-literal\">true</span>},\n { dataKey: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'action1'</span>, title:<span class=\"hljs-string\">'操作1'</span>, width:<span class=\"hljs-number\">100</span>, type:<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"action\"</span>,actions: [\n {\n title: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'编辑'</span>,\n callback: (rowData) =&gt; {\n me.refs.grid.editRow(rowData);\n },\n mode: Constants.MODE.VIEW\n },\n {\n title: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'保存'</span>,\n callback: (rowData) =&gt; {\n me.refs.grid.saveRow(rowData);\n },\n mode: Constants.MODE.EDIT\n }\n ]},\n { dataKey: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'action'</span>, title:<span class=\"hljs-string\">'链接'</span>, width:<span class=\"hljs-number\">100</span>, render: <span class=\"hljs-function\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\">function</span>(<span class=\"hljs-params\">cellData,rowData</span>) </span>{\n <span class=\"hljs-keyword\">return</span> <span class=\"xml\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">div</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">a</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">href</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"#\"</span>&gt;</span>{rowData.email}<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">a</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">div</span>&gt;</span>\n }}\n ]</span></code></pre></div><h2 id=\"列配置项的例子2（带列群组-since-ver-1-3-0）\">列配置项的例子2（带列群组, since ver. 1.3.0）</h2><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">\n<span class=\"hljs-keyword\">let</span> columns = [\n { dataKey: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'check'</span>, type: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'checkbox'</span>, disable: <span class=\"hljs-literal\">false</span>}, <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// custom checkbox column, dataKey can be anyone, true means checked.</span>\n {\n group: <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"国家\"</span>,\n columns: [\n { dataKey: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'country'</span>, title:<span class=\"hljs-string\">'国家'</span>, width: <span class=\"hljs-number\">200</span>,ordered:<span class=\"hljs-literal\">true</span>},\n { dataKey: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'country2'</span>, title:<span class=\"hljs-string\">'国家2'</span>, width: <span class=\"hljs-number\">200</span>,ordered:<span class=\"hljs-literal\">true</span>},\n ]\n }\n ]</code></pre></div><h2 id=\"rowselection-的例子\">rowSelection 的例子</h2><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">\n<span class=\"hljs-keyword\">let</span> rowSelection = {\n onSelect: <span class=\"hljs-function\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\">function</span>(<span class=\"hljs-params\">record, selected, selectedRows</span>) </span>{\n <span class=\"hljs-built_in\">console</span>.log(record, selected, selectedRows);\n },\n onSelectAll: <span class=\"hljs-function\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\">function</span>(<span class=\"hljs-params\">record, data</span>) </span>{\n <span class=\"hljs-built_in\">console</span>.log(record, data);\n }\n};</code></pre></div><h2 id=\"返回的数据格式\">返回的数据格式</h2><ul>\n<li>数据格式的约定<a href=\"http://gitlab.alibaba-inc.com/alinw/yosemite/issues/18\">见此</a> </li>\n</ul>\n<div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\"> {\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"content\"</span>:{\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"data\"</span>:[\n { \n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"id\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-string\">'1'</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"grade\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"grade1\"</span>,\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"email\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"email1\"</span>,\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"firstName\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"firstName1\"</span>,\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"lastName\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"lastName1\"</span>,\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"birthDate\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"birthDate1\"</span>,\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"country\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"country1\"</span>,\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"city\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"city1\"</span>\n }\n ...\n\n ],\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"currentPage\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-number\">1</span>,\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"totalCount\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-number\">30</span>\n },\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"success\"</span>: <span class=\"hljs-literal\">true</span>,\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"errorCode\"</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"\"</span>,\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"errorMsg\"</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"\"</span>\n }</code></pre></div><blockquote>\n<p>上面的数据格式是 ajax 返回的数据格式要求，如果你通过 jsxdata 传值，只需要 content 里面的内容。</p>\n</blockquote>\n<div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">{\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"data\"</span>:[\n { \n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"id\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-string\">'1'</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"grade\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"grade1\"</span>,\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"email\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"email1\"</span>,\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"firstName\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"firstName1\"</span>,\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"lastName\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"lastName1\"</span>,\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"birthDate\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"birthDate1\"</span>,\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"country\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"country1\"</span>,\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"city\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"city1\"</span>\n }\n ...\n\n ],\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"currentPage\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-number\">1</span>,\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"totalCount\"</span>:<span class=\"hljs-number\">30</span>\n}</code></pre></div><h3 id=\"actionbar-配置的例子\">ActionBar 配置的例子</h3><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">\n<span class=\"hljs-comment\">// actionBar 支持传入一个对象</span>\nactionBar: {\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"新增行\"</span>: () =&gt; { <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 点击回调</span>\n me.refs.grid.addEmptyRow();\n },\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"编辑所有行\"</span>: () =&gt; {\n me.refs.grid.editAllRow();\n }\n}\n\n<span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 或者定制能力更加强大的数组</span>\nactionBar: [\n {\n title: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'新增行'</span>, <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 显示名称</span>\n callback: () =&gt; { <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 点击回调</span>\n me.refs.grid.addEmptyRow();\n },\n render: (title) =&gt; { <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 定制渲染</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-keyword\">return</span> <span class=\"xml\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">Button</span>&gt;</span>{title}<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">Button</span>&gt;</span>\n }\n },\n {\n title: \"编辑所有行\",\n callback: () =&gt; {\n me.refs.grid.editAllRow();\n }\n },\n {\n title: \"保存所有行\",\n callback: () =&gt; {\n me.refs.grid.saveAllRow();\n }\n }\n\n]</span></code></pre></div><h3 id=\"actions-配置的例子\">actions 配置的例子</h3><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">actions: [\n {\n title: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'编辑'</span>, <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 操作名称</span>\n callback: (rowData) =&gt; { <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 操作回调</span>\n me.refs.grid.editRow(rowData);\n },\n mode: Constants.MODE.VIEW <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 非必要参数，只在何种模式下显示</span>\n },\n {\n title: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'保存'</span>,\n callback: (rowData) =&gt; {\n me.refs.grid.saveRow(rowData);\n },\n mode: Constants.MODE.EDIT,\n render: (title, rowData) =&gt; { <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 定制渲染</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-keyword\">return</span> title + <span class=\"hljs-string\">'1'</span>\n }\n }\n]</code></pre></div><h3 id=\"对于多行的支持\">对于多行的支持</h3><blockquote>\n<p>正常情况下，Table 中每个单元格按照一行缩略的方式展示，根据业务需要，有时可能需要展示多行，对此，Table 通过 prop <code>addRowClassName</code> 配合专属类名 <code>multiline</code> 来实现。示例如下：</p>\n</blockquote>\n<pre>addRowClassName: function(rowData) {\n return &#39;multiline&#39;;\n}</pre><blockquote>\n<p>需要注意：当配置为 multiline 时，用户需自己处理上下间距的问题，处理的方式应为在 multiline 或其他专属类名作用域下进行设置，避免影响其他非 multiline 设置的行。</p>\n</blockquote>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a href=\"#api\">API</a><ul><li><a href=\"#行内编辑用\">行内编辑用</a></li><li><a href=\"#获取数据\">获取数据</a></li><li><a href=\"#其他\">其他</a></li></ul></li><li><a href=\"#props\">Props</a><ul><li><a id=\"api\">API</h2><h3 id=\"tabs\">Tabs</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>name</th>\n<th>type</th>\n<th>default</th>\n<th>description</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>activeKey</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>current active tabPanel&#39;s key</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>defaultActiveKey</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>first active tabPanel&#39;s key</td>\n<td>initial active tabPanel&#39;s key if activeKey is absent</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onChange</td>\n<td>Function</td>\n<td>(key)</td>\n<td>called when tabPanel is changed</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onTabClick</td>\n<td>Function</td>\n<td>(key)</td>\n<td>called when tab is clicked</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>destroyInactiveTabPane</td>\n<td>Boolean</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td>whether destroy inactive tabpane when change tab</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>type</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>large</td>\n<td><code>large</code> <code>small</code> <code>filter</code> <code>brick</code></td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"tabpane\">TabPane</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>name</th>\n<th>type</th>\n<th>default</th>\n<th>description</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>key</td>\n<td>Object</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>corresponding to activeKey</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>tab</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>current tab&#39;s title corresponding to current tabPane</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a href=\"#api\">API</a><ul><li><a href=\"#tabs\">Tabs</a></li><li><a href=\"#tabpane\">TabPane</a></li></ul></ul>"},"site/components/tag/demo/add.md":{"title":"添加新标签","id":"components-tag-demo-add","tags":[],"filepath":"site/components/tag/demo/add.md","directory":"components/tag/demo","filename":"add","meta":{"title":"添加新标签","description":"\n<p>基本使用。</p>\n","order":"1","filepath":"site/components/tag/demo/add.md","filename":"add","directory":"components/tag/demo","id":"components-tag-demo-add","template":"demos","html":"<script>(function(){'use strict';\n\nvar _createClass = function () { function defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if (\"value\" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } } return function (Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }; }();\n\nfunction _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError(\"Cannot call a class as a function\"); } }\n\nfunction _possibleConstructorReturn(self, call) { if (!self) { throw new ReferenceError(\"this hasn't been initialised - super() hasn't been called\"); } return call && (typeof call === \"object\" || typeof call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, configurable: true } }); if (superClass) Object.setPrototypeOf ? 取得。</p>\n</blockquote>\n<table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>className</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&#39;&#39;</td>\n<td>额外的className</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>tag</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>require</td>\n<td>&#39;&#39;</td>\n<td>tag的值</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>count</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>0</td>\n<td>标签后面的数字</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>canAddCount</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td>是否可以增加数字</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>canDelete</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td>是否可以删除标签</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onClick(tagName)</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>点标签回调</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>maxDisplayCount</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>99</td>\n<td>最大显示数字</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onAddCount(tagName)</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>点击增加数字的加号回调</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onDelete(tagName, Control","filepath":"site/components/tinymce/index.md","filename":"index","directory":"components/tinymce","id":"components-tinymce-index","template":"components","html":"<h2 id=\"api\">API</h2><ul>\n<li>resetValue(value)：重置 tinymce 的值。\n参数：<ul>\n<li>value <code>string</code>：想要重置的值，支持富文本。</li>\n</ul>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<h2 id=\"props\">props</h2><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>配置项</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必填</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>功能/备注</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>config</td>\n<td>object</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>{}</td>\n<td>tinyMCE 的配置项，官方文档中所有 init 部分的配置在这里完成</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>content</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&quot;&quot;</td>\n<td>输入框中的默认值</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>placeholder</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>占位符</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onXXX</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>tinyMCE 所有在 setup 中绑定的事件可以使用此属性来完成。如 onChange、onKeyup 等，会传入两个参数：e 和 editor 实例。</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"图片上传配置\">图片上传配置</h3><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">uploadConfig: {\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"inputName\"</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"imageUploadInput\"</span>,<span class=\"hljs-comment\">//上传的file input的name属性，默认file</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"actionUrl\"</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"http://example.com/upload.json\"</span>,<span class=\"hljs-comment\">//数据提交后端处理接口，需要返回JSON格式数据</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"formatResult\"</span>: <span class=\"hljs-function\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\">function</span>(<span class=\"hljs-params\">response</span>)</span>{ <span class=\"hljs-comment\">//数据返回结构化，optional，供老接口兼容使用，return的Object是plugin预期的结构</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-keyword\">return</span> {\n content: {\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"name\"</span>: response.result.name,\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"downloarUrl\"</span>: response.result.url\n }\n };\n },\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"errorCallback\"</span>: <span class=\"hljs-function\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\">function</span>(<span class=\"hljs-params\"></span>)</span>{ <span class=\"hljs-comment\">//自定义的错误回调，optional，不设置会直接alert错误</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-built_in\">console</span>.log(<span class=\"hljs-string\">'errorCallback'</span>, <span class=\"hljs-built_in\">arguments</span>);\n },\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"progressCallback\"</span>: <span class=\"hljs-function\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\">function</span>(<span class=\"hljs-params\"></span>)</span>{ <span class=\"hljs-comment\">//自定义的上传进度回调，optional，不设置不显示进度</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-built_in\">console</span>.log(<span class=\"hljs-string\">'progressCallback'</span>, <span class=\"hljs-built_in\">arguments</span>);\n }\n}</code></pre></div><h2 id=\"events-包括\">Events 包括</h2><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\">// Include all of the Native DOM and custom events from:</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-comment\">// class=\"hljs-string\">'PostProcess'</span>, <span class=\"hljs-string\">'focus'</span>, <span class=\"hljs-string\">'blur'</span>\n];</code></pre></div><blockquote>\n<p>事件的具体含义和触发机制参考：<code>https://github.com/tinymce/tinymce/blob/master/tools/docs/tinymce.Editor.js#L5-L12</code></p>\n</blockquote>\n<h2 id=\"faq\">FAQ</h2><ul>\n<li>Q1: 如何能够准确地监听输入框的变化？\nA1: 建议同时监听 onChange 和 onKeyup 事件，更复杂的讨论见：<a href=\"https://github.com/uxcore/uxcore-tinymce/issues/1\">https://github.com/uxcore/uxcore-tinymce/issues/1</a></li>\n</ul>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a href=\"#api\">API</a></li><li><a href=\"#props\">props</a><ul><li><a href=\"#图片上传配置\">图片上传配置</a></li></ul></li><li><a href=\"#events-包括\">Events 包括</a></li><li><a href=\"#faq\">FAQ</a></li></ul>"},"site/components/tooltip/demo/basic.md":{"title":"基本","id":"components-tooltip-demo-basic","tags":[],"filepath":"site/components/tooltip/demo/basic.md","directory":"components/tooltip/demo","filename":"basic","meta":{"title":"基本","description":"\n<p>最简单的用法。</p>\n","order":"0","filepath":"site/components/tooltip/demo/basic.md","filename":"basic","directory":"components/tooltip/demo","id":"components-tooltip-demo-basic","template":"demos","html":"<script>(function(){'use strict';\n\nvar Tooltip = require('uxcore-tooltip');\n\nReactDOM.render(React.createElement(\n Tooltip,\n { overlay: '提示文字' },\n React.createElement(\n 'span',\n null,\n '鼠标移上来就会出现提示'\n )\n), strict';\n\nvar _createClass = function () { function defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if (\"value\" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } } return function (Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }; }();\n\nfunction _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError(\"Cannot call a class as a function\"); } }\n\nfunction _possibleConstructorReturn(self, call) { if (!self) { throw new ReferenceError(\"this hasn't been initialised - super() hasn't been called\"); } return call && (typeof call === \"object\" || typeof call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, configurable: true } }); if (superClass) Object.setPrototypeOf ? Object.setPrototypeOf(subClass, superClass) : subClass.__proto__ = superClass; }\n\nvar Tooltip = require('uxcore-tooltip');\nvar Button = require('uxcore-button');\n\nvar Demo = function (_React$Component) {\n _inherits(Demo, _React$Component);\n\n function Demo() {\n _classCallCheck(this, Demo);\n\n return _possibleConstructorReturn(this, (Demo.__proto__ || Object.getPrototypeOf(Demo)).apply(this, arguments));\n }\n\n _createClass(Demo, [{\n key: 'render',\n value: function render() {\n var overlay = React.createElement(\n 'div',\n { style: { height: 50, width: 100, lineHeight: '50px' } },\n '提示文字'\n );\n return React.createElement(\n 'div',\n { className: 'demo' },\n React.createElement(\n 'div',\n { className: 'container' },\n React.createElement(\n 'div',\n { className: 'top' },\n React.createElement(\n Tooltip,\n { overlay: overlay, placement: 'topLeft', trigger: ['click'] },\n React.createElement(\n Button,\n { size: 'small', type: 'outline' 'outline' },\n '上'\n )\n ),\n React.createElement(\n Tooltip,\n { overlay: overlay, placement: 'topRight', trigger: ['click'] },\n React.createElement(\n Button,\n { style: { marginLeft: 10 }, size: 'small', type: 'outline' },\n '上右'\n )\n )\n ),\n React.createElement(\n 'div',\n { className: 'bottom' },\n React.createElement(\n Tooltip,\n { overlay: overlay, placement: 'bottomLeft', trigger: ['click'] },\n React.createElement(\n Button,\n { size: 'small', type: 'outline' },\n '下左'\n )\n ),\n React.createElement(\n Tooltip,\n { overlay: overlay, placement: 'bottom', trigger: ['click'] },\n trigger: ['click'] },\n React.createElement(\n Button,\n { style: { marginLeft: 10 }, size: 'small', type: 'outline' },\n '下右'\n )\n )\n ),\n React.createElement(\n 'div',\n { className: 'left' },\n id=\"何时使用\">何时使用</h2><p>鼠标移入则显示提示，移出消失，气泡浮层不承载复杂文本和操作。</p>\n<p>可用来代替系统默认的 <code>title</code> 提示，提供一个<code>按钮/文字/操作</code>的文案解释。</p>\n<h2 id=\"api\">API</h2><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>参数</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>说明</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>overlayClassName</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>uxcore</td>\n<td>additional className added to popup overlay</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>trigger</td>\n<td>string[]</td>\n<td>[&#39;hover&#39;]</td>\n<td>which actions cause tooltip shown. enum of &#39;hover&#39;,&#39;click&#39;,&#39;focus&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>mouseEnterDelay</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>0</td>\n<td>delay time to show when mouse enter.unit: s.</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>mouseLeaveDelay</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>0.1</td>\n<td>delay time to hide when mouse leave.unit: s.</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>overlayStyle</td>\n<td>Object</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>additional style of overlay node</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>wrapStyle</td>\n<td>Object</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>additional style of wrap node</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>prefixCls</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>kuma-tooltip</td>\n<td>prefix class name</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onVisibleChange</td>\n<td>Function</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>call when visible is changed</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>visible</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>whether tooltip is visible</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>defaultVisible</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>whether tooltip is visible initially</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>placement</td>\n<td>String or Object</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>one of [&#39;left&#39;,&#39;right&#39;,&#39;top&#39;,&#39;bottom&#39;, &#39;topLeft&#39;, &#39;topRight&#39;, &#39;bottomLeft&#39;, &#39;bottomRight&#39;] or alignConfig of <a href=\"https://github.com/yiminghe/dom-align\">dom-align</a></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>align</td>\n<td>Object: alignConfig of <a href=\"https://github.com/yiminghe/dom-align\">dom-align</a></td>\n<td></td>\n<td>only valid when placement&#39;s type is String. value will be merged into placement&#39;s align config. note: can only accept offset and targetOffset</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>overlay</td>\n<td>React.Element</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>popup content</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>getTooltipContainer</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>function returning html node which will act as tooltip contaier</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a href=\"#何时使用\">何时使用</a></li><li><a href=\"#api\">API</a></li></ul>"},"site/components/totop/demo/basic.md":{"title":"基本用法","id":"components-totop-demo-basic","tags":[],"filepath":"site/components/totop/demo/basic.md","directory":"components/totop/demo","filename":"basic","meta":{"title":"基本用法","description":"\n<p>基本用法。</p>\n","order":"0","filepath":"site/components/totop/demo/basic.md","filename":"basic","directory":"components/totop/demo","id":"components-totop-demo-basic","template":"demos","html":"<script>(function(){'use px</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>distance</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>30</td>\n<td>向下滑多少距离出现回到顶部</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>duration</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>600</td>\n<td>动画持续时间</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>theme</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>默认为方形，另提供 class=\"hljs-built_in\">console</span>.log(data);\n }\n\n render() {\n <span class=\"hljs-keyword\">var</span> me = <span class=\"hljs-keyword\">this</span>;\n <span class=\"hljs-keyword\">return</span> (\n <span class=\"xml\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">Transfer</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">data</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">{mockData}</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">onChange</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">{me._handleChange.bind(me)}</span>/&gt;</span>\n )</span>;\n }\n}</code></pre></div><h2 id=\"api\">API</h2><ul>\n<li>selectItems(arr): 使对应 value 的变成高亮状态 (selected)。<br>参数： <ul>\n<li>arr <code>Array</code> 一个由 value 组成的数组。</li>\n</ul>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<h2 id=\"props\">Props</h2><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>参数</th>\n<th>类型</th>\n<th>必需</th>\n<th>默认值</th>\n<th>说明</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>data</td>\n<td>array</td>\n<td>required</td>\n<td>-</td>\n<td>用于初始化 transfer 的数据，格式见 Usage，其中 name 和 value 字段必有</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>disabled</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td>是否启用 disable 模式</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showSearch</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td>是否显示搜索条</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>searchPlaceholder</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>定位输入内容</td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>leftTitle</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&#39;未选中的&#39;</td>\n<td>左侧标题</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>rightTitle</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>&#39;已选中的&#39;</td>\n<td>右侧标题</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onChange</td>\n<td>func</td>\n<td>optional</td>\n<td>noop</td>\n<td>选中情况变化时触发，返回选中和未选中的项</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a href=\"#usage\">Usage</a></li><li><a href=\"#api\">API</a></li><li><a href=\"#props\">Props</a></li></ul>"},"site/components/tree/demo/basic.md":{"title":"基本用法","id":"components-tree-demo-basic","tags":[],"filepath":"site/components/tree/demo/basic.md","directory":"components/tree/demo","filename":"basic","meta":{"title":"基本用法","description":"\n<p>基本用法。</p>\n","order":"0","filepath":"site/components/tree/demo/basic.md","filename":"basic","directory":"components/tree/demo","id":"components-tree-demo-basic","template":"demos","html":"<script>(function(){'use id=\"api\">API</h2><h3 id=\"tree-props\">Tree props</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>name</th>\n<th>description</th>\n<th>type</th>\n<th>default</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>className</td>\n<td>additional css class of root dom node</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>&#39;&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>prefixCls</td>\n<td>prefix class</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>&#39;&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showLine</td>\n<td>whether show line</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>true</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showIcon</td>\n<td>whether show icon</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>true</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>selectable</td>\n<td>whether can be selected</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>true</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>multiple</td>\n<td>whether multiple select</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>checkable</td>\n<td>whether support checked</td>\n<td>bool/React Node</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>defaultExpandAll</td>\n<td>expand all treeNodes</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>defaultExpandedKeys</td>\n<td>expand specific treeNodes</td>\n<td>String[]</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>expandedKeys</td>\n<td>Controlled expand specific treeNodes</td>\n<td>String[]</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>autoExpandParent</td>\n<td>whether auto expand parent treeNodes</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>true</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>checkedKeys</td>\n<td>Controlled checked treeNodes(After setting, defaultCheckedKeys will not work)</td>\n<td>String[]</td>\n<td>[]</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>defaultCheckedKeys</td>\n<td>default checked treeNodes</td>\n<td>String[]</td>\n<td>[]</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>selectedKeys</td>\n<td>Controlled selected treeNodes(After setting, defaultSelectedKeys will not work)</td>\n<td>String[]</td>\n<td>[]</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>defaultSelectedKeys</td>\n<td>default selected treeNodes</td>\n<td>String[]</td>\n<td>[]</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onExpand</td>\n<td>fire on treeNode expand or not</td>\n<td>function(node, expanded, expandedKeys)</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onCheck</td>\n<td>click the treeNode/checkbox to fire</td>\n<td>function(checkedKeys, e:{checked: bool, checkedNodes, node, event})</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onSelect</td>\n<td>click the treeNode to fire</td>\n<td>function(selectedKeys, e:{selected: bool, selectedNodes, node, event})</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>filterTreeNode</td>\n<td>filter some treeNodes as you need. it should return true</td>\n<td>function(node)</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>loadData</td>\n<td>load data asynchronously and the return value should be a promise</td>\n<td>function(node)</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onRightClick</td>\n<td>select current treeNode and show customized contextmenu</td>\n<td>function({event,node})</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onMouseEnter</td>\n<td>call when mouse enter a treeNode</td>\n<td>function({event,node})</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onMouseLeave</td>\n<td>call when mouse leave a treeNode</td>\n<td>function({event,node})</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>draggable</td>\n<td>whether can drag treeNode. (drag events are not supported in Internet Explorer 8 and earlier versions or Safari 5.1 and earlier versions.)</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onDragStart</td>\n<td>it execs when fire the tree&#39;s dragstart event</td>\n<td>function({event,node})</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onDragEnter</td>\n<td>it execs when fire the tree&#39;s dragenter event</td>\n<td>function({event,node,expandedKeys})</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onDragOver</td>\n<td>it execs when fire the tree&#39;s dragover event</td>\n<td>function({event,node})</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onDragLeave</td>\n<td>it execs when fire the tree&#39;s dragleave event</td>\n<td>function({event,node})</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onDrop</td>\n<td>it execs when fire the tree&#39;s drop event</td>\n<td>function({event, node, dragNode, dragNodesKeys})</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"treenode-props\">TreeNode props</h3><blockquote>\n<p>note: if you have a lot of TreeNode, like more than 1000,<br>make the parent node is collapsed by default, will obvious effect, very fast.<br>Because the children hide TreeNode will not insert into dom.</p>\n</blockquote>\n<table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>name</th>\n<th>description</th>\n<th>type</th>\n<th>default</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>className</td>\n<td>additional class to treeNode</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>&#39;&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>disabled</td>\n<td>whether disabled the treeNode</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>disableCheckbox</td>\n<td>whether disable the treeNode&#39; checkbox</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>title</td>\n<td>tree/subTree&#39;s title</td>\n<td>String/node</td>\n<td>&#39;---&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>key</td>\n<td>it&#39;s used with tree props&#39;s (default)ExpandedKeys / (default)CheckedKeys / (default)SelectedKeys. you&#39;d better to set it, and it must be unique in the tree&#39;s all treeNodes</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>treeNode&#39;s position</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>isLeaf</td>\n<td>whether it&#39;s leaf node</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a href=\"#api\">API</a><ul><li><a href=\"#tree-props\">Tree props</a></li><li><a href=\"#treenode-props\">TreeNode props</a></li></ul></ul>"},"site/components/tree-select/demo/basic.md":{"title":"基本用法","id":"components-tree-select-demo-basic","tags":[],"filepath":"site/components/tree-select/demo/basic.md","directory":"components/tree-select/demo","filename":"basic","meta":{"title":"基本用法","description":"\n<p>基本用法。</p>\n","order":"0","filepath":"site/components/tree-select/demo/basic.md","filename":"basic","directory":"components/tree-select/demo","id":"components-tree-select-demo-basic","template":"demos","html":"<script>(function(){'use strict';\n\nvar _createClass = function () { function defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, [] : arguments[3];\n\n // x：每一级下的节点总数。y：每级节点里有y个节点、存在子节点。z：树的level层级数（0表示一级）\n function _loop(_level, _preKey, _tns) {\n var preKey = _preKey || '0';\n var tns = _tns || gData;\n\n var children = children.push(key);\n }\n }\n if (_level < 0) {\n return tns;\n }\n var __level = _level - 1;\n children.forEach(function (key, index) {\n tns[index].children = [];\n return _loop(__level, key, tns[index].children);\n });\n }\n _loop(z);\n return gData;\n}\n\nvar gData = generateData();\n\nvar MultipleDemo = function (_React$Component) {\n _inherits(MultipleDemo, _React$Component);\n\n Control","filepath":"site/components/tree-select/index.md","filename":"index","directory":"components/tree-select","id":"components-tree-select-index","template":"components","html":"<p>树型选择控件</p>\n<h2 id=\"何时使用\">何时使用</h2><p>类似 Select 的选择控件，可选择的数据结构是一个树形结构时，可以使用 TreeSelect，例如公司层级、学科系统、分类目录等等。</p>\n<h2 id=\"api\">API</h2><h3 id=\"treeselect-props\">TreeSelect props</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>name</th>\n<th>description</th>\n<th>type</th>\n<th>default</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>className</td>\n<td>additional css class of root dom node</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>&#39;&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>prefixCls</td>\n<td>prefix class</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>&#39;uxcore-tree-select&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>animation</td>\n<td>dropdown animation name. only support slide-up now</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>&#39;&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>transitionName</td>\n<td>dropdown css animation name</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>&#39;&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>choiceTransitionName</td>\n<td>css animation name for selected items at multiple mode</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>&#39;&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>dropdownMatchSelectWidth</td>\n<td>whether dropdown&#39;s with is same with select</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>true</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>dropdownClassName</td>\n<td>additional className applied to dropdown</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>dropdownStyle</td>\n<td>additional style applied to dropdown</td>\n<td>Object</td>\n<td>{}</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>dropdownPopupAlign</td>\n<td>specify alignment for dropdown</td>\n<td>Object</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>notFoundContent</td>\n<td>specify content to show when no result matches.</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>&#39;Not Found&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showSearch</td>\n<td>whether show search input in single mode</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>true</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>allowClear</td>\n<td>whether allowClear</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>maxTagTextLength</td>\n<td>max tag text length to show</td>\n<td>number</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>multiple</td>\n<td>whether multiple select (true when enable treeCheckable)</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>disabled</td>\n<td>whether disabled select</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>inputValue</td>\n<td>if enable search, you can set default input&#39;s value, if set to null, auto clear input value when finish select/unselect operation</td>\n<td>string/null</td>\n<td>&#39;&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>defaultValue</td>\n<td>initial selected treeNode(s)</td>\n<td>same as value type</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>value</td>\n<td>current selected treeNode(s).</td>\n<td>normal: String/Array<String>. labelInValue: {value:String,label:React.Node}/Array&lt;{value,label}&gt;. treeCheckStrictly(halfChecked default false): {value:String,label:React.Node, halfChecked}/Array&lt;{value,label,halfChecked}&gt;.</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>labelInValue</td>\n<td>whether to embed label in value, see above value type</td>\n<td>Bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onChange</td>\n<td>called when select treeNode or input value change</td>\n<td>function(value, label(null), extra)</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onSelect</td>\n<td>called when select treeNode</td>\n<td>function(value, node, extra)</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onSearch</td>\n<td>called when input changed</td>\n<td>function</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>showCheckedStrategy</td>\n<td><code>TreeSelect.SHOW_ALL</code>: show all checked treeNodes (Include parent treeNode). <code>TreeSelect.SHOW_PARENT</code>: show checked treeNodes (Just show parent treeNode). Default just show child.</td>\n<td>enum{TreeSelect.SHOW_ALL, TreeSelect.SHOW_PARENT, TreeSelect.SHOW_CHILD }</td>\n<td>TreeSelect.SHOW_CHILD</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>treeIcon</td>\n<td>show tree icon</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>treeLine</td>\n<td>show tree line</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>treeDefaultExpandAll</td>\n<td>default expand all treeNode</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>treeCheckable</td>\n<td>whether tree show checkbox (select callback will not fire)</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>treeCheckStrictly</td>\n<td>check node precisely, parent and children nodes are not associated</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>filterTreeNode</td>\n<td>whether filter treeNodes by input value. default filter by treeNode&#39;s treeNodeFilterProp prop&#39;s value</td>\n<td>bool/Function(inputValue:string, treeNode:TreeNode)</td>\n<td>Function</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>treeNodeFilterProp</td>\n<td>which prop value of treeNode will be used for filter if filterTreeNode return true</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>&#39;value&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>treeNodeLabelProp</td>\n<td>which prop value of treeNode will render as content of select</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>&#39;title&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>treeData</td>\n<td>treeNodes data Array, if set it then you need not to construct children TreeNode. (value should be unique across the whole array)</td>\n<td>array&lt;{value,label,children, [disabled]}&gt;</td>\n<td>[]</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>treeDataSimpleMode</td>\n<td>enable simple mode of treeData.(treeData should be like this: [{&quot;id&quot;:1, &quot;pId&quot;:0, &quot;label&quot;:&quot;test1&quot;},...], <code>pId</code> is parent node&#39;s id)</td>\n<td>bool/object{id:&#39;id&#39;, pId:&#39;pId&#39;, rootPId:null}</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>loadData</td>\n<td>load data asynchronously</td>\n<td>function(node)</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"treenode-props\">TreeNode props</h3><blockquote>\n<p>note: you&#39;d better to use <code>treeData</code> instead of using TreeNode.</p>\n</blockquote>\n<table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>name</th>\n<th>description</th>\n<th>type</th>\n<th>default</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>disabled</td>\n<td>disable treeNode</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>key</td>\n<td>it&#39;s value must be unique across the tree&#39;s all TreeNode, you must set it</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>-</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>value</td>\n<td>default as treeNodeFilterProp (be unique across the tree&#39;s all TreeNode)</td>\n<td>String</td>\n<td>&#39;&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>title</td>\n<td>tree/subTree&#39;s title</td>\n<td>String/element</td>\n<td>&#39;---&#39;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>isLeaf</td>\n<td>whether it&#39;s leaf node</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a href=\"#何时使用\">何时使用</a></li><li><a href=\"#api\">API</a><ul><li><a href=\"#treeselect-props\">TreeSelect props</a></li><li><a href=\"#treenode-props\">TreeNode props</a></li></ul></ul>"},"site/components/uploader/demo/basic.md":{"title":"基本用法","id":"components-uploader-demo-basic","tags":[],"filepath":"site/components/uploader/demo/basic.md","directory":"components/uploader/demo","filename":"basic","meta":{"title":"基本用法","description":"\n<p>基本用法。</p>\n","order":"0","filepath":"site/components/uploader/demo/basic.md","filename":"basic","directory":"components/uploader/demo","id":"components-uploader-demo-basic","template":"demos","html":"<script>(function(){'use Control","filepath":"site/components/uploader/index.md","filename":"index","directory":"components/uploader","id":"components-uploader-index","template":"components","html":"<p>上传组件, 封装<a href=\"https://github.com/uxcore/uxcore-uploadcore/\">UploadCore</a>核心组件, 作为UI层.</p>\n<h2 id=\"api\">API</h2><h3 id=\"reset\">reset()</h3><p>重置文件队列</p>\n<h2 id=\"props\">Props</h2><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>name</th>\n<th>type</th>\n<th>default</th>\n<th>Since Ver.</th>\n<th>description</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>className</td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>locale</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>zh-cn</td>\n<td>1.1.10</td>\n<td>国际化，目前支持 <code>zh-cn</code> 和 <code>en-us</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>fileList</td>\n<td>array</td>\n<td>[]</td>\n<td>1.2.3</td>\n<td>用于展示的文件列表</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>isOnlyImg</td>\n<td>boolean</td>\n<td>是否以图片形式展示</td>\n<td></td>\n<td></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>core</td>\n<td>string/<code>Core</code></td>\n<td>null</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>唯一标识或者UploadCore对象, 防止重复创建, 当传入UploadCore对象时,下列参数和事件设置均无效</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>name</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>&#39;file&#39;</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>上传文件字段名称</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>url</td>\n<td>string</td>\n<td>&#39;&#39;</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>响应上传服务器地址</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>params</td>\n<td>object/array</td>\n<td>null</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>上传文件额外参数</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>headers</td>\n<td>array</td>\n<td>null</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>上传文件额外头</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>withCredentials</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>上传文件是否自动附带cookie等信息</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>timeout</td>\n<td>int</td>\n<td>0</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>上传超时限制 0表示不限制</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>chunkEnable</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>是否允许分片上传</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>chunkSize</td>\n<td>size</td>\n<td>0</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>文件分片大小, 默认单位b，0不分片</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>chunkRetries</td>\n<td>int</td>\n<td>0</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>文件分片上传重试次数</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>chunkProcessThreads</td>\n<td>int</td>\n<td>2</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>分片上传并发数</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>processThreads</td>\n<td>int</td>\n<td>2</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>文件上传并发数</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>queueCapcity</td>\n<td>int</td>\n<td>0</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>队列容量，0无限</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>autoPending</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>是否选择后自动等待上传</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>multiple</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>true</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>是否多选</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>accept</td>\n<td>string/array</td>\n<td>null</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>允许文件类型</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>sizeLimit</td>\n<td>size</td>\n<td>0</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>文件大小限制, 0表示不限制</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>preventDuplicate</td>\n<td>bool</td>\n<td>false</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>是否防止文件重复</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"filelist-的最小格式-格式稍显麻烦，是为了-onchange-的返回值可以传回给-filelist\">fileList 的最小格式 (格式稍显麻烦，是为了 onChange 的返回值可以传回给 fileList)</h3><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">[\n {\n name: <span class=\"hljs-string\">''</span>, <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 文件名称，列表形式必填</span>\n ext: <span class=\"hljs-string\">''</span>, <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 文件扩展名。例如 jpg。可选，不填时无法根据类型展示对应图标</span>\n fileType: <span class=\"hljs-string\">''</span>, <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 文件 mimetypes 类型。 例如 image/jpg。 可选，不填时无法根据类型展示对应图标</span>\n response: {\n url: xxx, <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 文件链接，必填</span>\n canRemove: <span class=\"hljs-literal\">true</span>, <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 是否可以删除，可选</span>\n downloadUrl: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'xxxx'</span>, <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 下载 URL，可选</span>\n }\n }\n]</code></pre></div><h3 id=\"events\">Events</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>name</th>\n<th>arguments</th>\n<th>description</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>onChange</td>\n<td>fileList</td>\n<td>在上传成功或文件移除后触发，返回文件队列，包括自己传入的<code>fileList</code></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onCancel</td>\n<td>file</td>\n<td>文件移除后触发，上传的文件和默认列表的文件格式会有所不同，文件格式参见下面的 fileList 格式</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onfileuploaderror</td>\n<td><code>File</code>, <code>Error</code></td>\n<td>文件上传失败</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<h3 id=\"onchange-的-filelist-的枚举格式有如下几种\">onChange 的 fileList 的枚举格式有如下几种</h3><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">[\n <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 上传后的文件的格式， response 即服务器返回的值</span>\n {\n type: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'upload'</span>,\n ext: file.ext,\n name: file.name,\n response: <span class=\"hljs-built_in\">JSON</span>.parse(file.response.rawResponse.rawResponse)\n },\n <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 预览用文件的格式， `props.fileList` 相关， responce 即 `props.fileList` 里传入的格式。</span>\n {\n type: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'list'</span>,\n response: file\n },\n <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 被删除的文件的格式</span>\n {\n type: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'delete'</span>,\n subType: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'list/upload'</span>, <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 与上面两种类型对应，用于解析 response</span>\n response: file <span class=\"hljs-comment\">// 与上面的 subType 相对应</span>\n }\n]</code></pre></div><h3 id=\"other-events\">Other Events</h3><table>\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th>name</th>\n<th>arguments</th>\n<th>description</th>\n</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td>onqueueuploadstart</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>队列上传开始</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onqueueuploadend</td>\n<td></td>\n<td>队列上传结束</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onqueuefileadded</td>\n<td><code>File</code></td>\n<td>队列添加了一个文件</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onqueuefilefiltered</td>\n<td><code>File</code>, <code>Error</code></td>\n<td>队列过滤了一个文件</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onqueueerror</td>\n<td><code>Error</code></td>\n<td>队列错误</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onstatchange</td>\n<td><code>Stat</code></td>\n<td>文件统计发生变化</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onfileuploadstart</td>\n<td><code>File</code></td>\n<td>文件上传开始</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onfileuploadpreparing</td>\n<td><code>FileRequest</code></td>\n<td>文件上传准备时</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onfileuploadprepared</td>\n<td><code>File</code>, <code>FileRequest</code></td>\n<td>文件上传准备好了</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onchunkuploadpreparing</td>\n<td><code>ChunkRequest</code></td>\n<td>分块上传准备时</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onchunkuploadcompleting</td>\n<td><code>ChunkResponse</code></td>\n<td>分块上传结束时</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onfileuploadprogress</td>\n<td><code>File</code>, <code>Progress</code></td>\n<td>文件上传进度中</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onfileuploadend</td>\n<td><code>File</code></td>\n<td>文件上传结束</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onfileuploadcompleting</td>\n<td><code>FileResponse</code></td>\n<td>文件上传结束时</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onfileuploadsuccess</td>\n<td><code>File</code>, <code>FileResponse</code></td>\n<td>文件上传成功</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onfileuploadcompleted</td>\n<td><code>File</code>, <code>Status</code></td>\n<td>文件上传完成了</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onfilestatuschange</td>\n<td><code>File</code>, <code>Status</code></td>\n<td>文件状态发生变化</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>onfilecancel</td>\n<td><code>File</code></td>\n<td>文件退出</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody>\n</table>\n<p>具体配置信息见<a href=\"https://github.com/uxcore/uxcore-uploadcore/blob/master/README.md\">https://github.com/uxcore/uxcore-uploadcore/blob/master/README.md</a>.</p>\n"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a
