(格式稍显麻烦，是为了 onChange 的返回值可以传回给 fileList)</a></li><li><a href=\"#events\">Events</a></li><li><a href=\"#onchange-的-filelist-的枚举格式有如下几种\">onChange 的 fileList 的枚举格式有如下几种</a></li><li><a href=\"#other-events\">Other Events</a></li></ul></ul>"},"site/components/validator/index.md":{"title":"Validator","id":"components-validator-index","tags":{"author":{"name":"eternalsky"}},"filepath":"site/components/validator/index.md","directory":"components/validator","filename":"index","meta":{"title":"Validator","description":"\n","category":"Components","subtype":"Tool","chinese":"基础校验","filepath":"site/components/validator/index.md","filename":"index","directory":"components/validator","id":"components-validator-index","template":"components","html":"<blockquote>\n<p>供了一些通用的 validator<br>所有的 validator 返回 true，表示通过。 </p>\n</blockquote>\n<ul>\n<li>isNotEmpty: 空对象、空数组、空字符串都被理解为空。</li>\n<li>isNum: 判断是否为数字，注意这里的数字包括字符串和数值两种数据类型。</li>\n<li>isInt: 是否是整数</li>\n<li>isDecimal: 是否是小数</li>\n<li>isArray</li>\n<li>isRegExp</li>\n<li>isObject</li>\n<li>isFunc</li>\n<li>isEmail</li>\n<li>isUrl: 只做 host 部分的检测，这只是一个非常基础的检测，通过你需要搭配非法字符一同进行。</li>\n<li>isHex</li>\n<li>isIdCard: 是否是中国身份证。</li>\n<li>isCNMobile: 是否是中国手机号。</li>\n</ul>\n<h2 id=\"usage\">Usage</h2><pre>var validator = require(&quot;uxcore-validator&quot;);\nconsole.log(validator.isNum(1));\n// return true\nconsole.log(validator.isNum(&quot;1&quot;));\n// return true\nconsole.log(validator.isNum(&quot;a&quot;));\n// return false</pre>"},"status":"public","toc":"<ul><li><a href=\"#usage\">Usage</a></li></ul>"},"site/css/base/index.md":{"title":"Base","id":"css-base-index","tags":[],"filepath":"site/css/base/index.md","directory":"css/base","filename":"index","meta":{"title":"Base","description":"\n","order":"0","category":"CSS","chinese":"基础样式","filepath":"site/css/base/index.md","filename":"index","directory":"css/base","id":"css-base-index","template":"css","html":"<h2 Quae, molestiae!</p>\n <p>导合军怎减整助料内击状或回破他未伯五本首斤伯达铁化刚动胜粮未搞内，水听标银燃鲜杆走片广处律功入威帮拉所可宗零格社吧底历代行容到尽波，专岁间年气达队口权材速终马齐际沉脚刑也扬抓划洲见本？</p>\n <p style=\"font-size: 14px;\">帝家天山紧足属但轴因报农源晚依卷而。绝谈计视体沿清掌力批传处旧误众专身力创握给学裂龙伯早胶约党。</p>\n <p style=\"font-size: 16px;\">草公该虽稳怕现称上级江，率村破爱球乱条江剧除法大粒联歌管饭公代种广热况电谈孩研含时变及日及，板牛井急苏触培脚武位再节国火座备？</p>\n</div></div><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"xml\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">div</span>&gt;</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">p</span>&gt;</span>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. class=\"hljs-title\">p</span>&gt;</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">p</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">style</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"font-size: 14px;\"</span>&gt;</span>帝家天山紧足属但轴因报农源晚依卷而。绝谈计视体沿清掌力批传处旧误众专身力创握给学裂龙伯早胶约党。<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">p</span>&gt;</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">p</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">style</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"font-size: 16px;\"</span>&gt;</span>草公该虽稳怕现称上级江，率村破爱球乱条江剧除法大粒联歌管饭公代种广热况电谈孩研含时变及日及，板牛井急苏触培脚武位再节国火座备？<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">p</span>&gt;</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">div</span>&gt;</span></code></pre></div><h2 id=\"链接\">链接</h2><div class=\"nico-insert-code\"><a href=\"http://ux.alibaba.net/\" class=\"link-demo\">This is a link</a><br/>\n<a href=\"http://ux.alibaba.net/\" class=\"link-demo\">这是一个链接</a></div><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"xml\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">a</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">href</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"http://ux.alibaba.net/\"</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"link-demo\"</span>&gt;</span>This is a link<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">a</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">br</span>/&gt;</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">a</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">href</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"http://ux.alibaba.net/\"</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"link-demo\"</span>&gt;</span>这是一个链接<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">a</span>&gt;</span></code></pre></div><h2 id=\"常用的全局属性列表\">常用的全局属性列表</h2><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"css\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\">/*配合JS交互的隐藏*/</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-class\">.fn-hide</span> <span class=\"hljs-rules\">{\n <span class=\"hljs-rule\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\">display</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\">none</span></span>;\n}</span>\n\n<span class=\"hljs-comment\">/*左-右浮动*/</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-class\">.fn-left</span> <span class=\"hljs-rules\">{\n <span class=\"hljs-rule\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\">float</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\">left</span></span>;\n}</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-class\">.fn-right</span> <span class=\"hljs-rules\">{\n <span class=\"hljs-rule\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\">float</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\">right</span></span>;\n}</span>\n\n<span class=\"hljs-comment\">/*当单行文字溢出时，可以采用省略号代替展示；当使用 `fn-text-overflow`属性时需要在业务样式中指定`宽度`来调整。*/</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-class\">.fn-text-overflow</span> <span class=\"hljs-rules\">{\n <span class=\"hljs-rule\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\">overflow</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\"> hidden</span></span>;\n <span class=\"hljs-rule\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\">text-overflow</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\"> ellipsis</span></span>;\n <span class=\"hljs-rule\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\">white-space</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\"> nowrap</span></span>;\n}</span>\n\n<span class=\"hljs-comment\">/*高亮文案颜色*/</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-class\">.fn-highlight</span> <span class=\"hljs-rules\">{\n <span class=\"hljs-rule\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\">color</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\"> <span class=\"hljs-hexcolor\">#f60</span></span></span>;\n}</span>\n\n<span class=\"hljs-comment\">/*备注文案颜色*/</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-class\">.fn-comment</span> <span class=\"hljs-rules\">{\n <span class=\"hljs-rule\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\">color</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\"> <span class=\"hljs-hexcolor\">#999</span></span></span>;\n}</span>\n\n<span class=\"hljs-comment\">/*chrome下字体过小的问题*/</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-class\">.fn-webkit-adjust</span> <span class=\"hljs-rules\">{\n <span class=\"hljs-rule\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\">-webkit-text-size-adjust</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\"> none</span></span>;\n}</span></code></pre></div><h2 id=\"清除浮动类\">清除浮动类</h2><blockquote>\n<p>当使用float属性来改变样式时，经常会出现兼容性问题；所以根据经验当操作float属性时要学会适当使用<code>fn-clear</code>样式。</p>\n</blockquote>\n<div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"css\"><span class=\"hljs-class\">.fn-clear</span><span class=\"hljs-pseudo\">:after</span> <span class=\"hljs-rules\">{\n <span class=\"hljs-rule\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\">visibility</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\">hidden</span></span>;\n <span class=\"hljs-rule\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\">display</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\">block</span></span>;\n <span class=\"hljs-rule\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\">font-size</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\"><span class=\"hljs-number\">0</span></span></span>;\n <span class=\"hljs-rule\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\">content</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\"><span class=\"hljs-string\">\" \"</span></span></span>;\n <span class=\"hljs-rule\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\">clear</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\">both</span></span>;\n <span class=\"hljs-rule\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\">height</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\"><span class=\"hljs-number\">0</span></span></span>;\n}</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-class\">.fn-clear</span> <span class=\"hljs-rules\">{\n <span class=\"hljs-rule\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\">zoom</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\"><span class=\"hljs-number\">1</span></span></span>; <span class=\"hljs-comment\">/* for IE6 IE7 */</span>\n}</span></code></pre></div><p>使用起来也非常简单，只需要在包含有浮动属性元素的父级层添加<code>fn-clear</code>即可轻松清除并触发<code>hasLayout</code>。</p>\n<div class=\"nico-insert-code\"><div class=\"parent fn-clear\">\n <div class=\"fn-left\">child-1</div>\n <div class=\"fn-right\">child-2</div>\n</div></div><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"xml\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"parent fn-clear\"</span>&gt;</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"fn-left\"</span>&gt;</span>child-1<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">div</span>&gt;</span>\n <span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"fn-right\"</span>&gt;</span>child-2<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">div</span>&gt;</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">div</span>&gt;</span></code></pre></div><h2 id=\"加载指示器\">加载指示器</h2><div class=\"nico-insert-code\"><div class=\"kuma-loading-s\"></div>\n<br>\n<div id=\"筛选\">筛选</h2><ul>\n<li>场景描述：多选标签，点击选中、再次点击取消选中</li>\n</ul>\n<div class=\"nico-insert-code\"><ul class=\"kuma-tag-pickable\">\n <li class=\"kuma-tag\">\n <a href=\"javascript:void(0)\">\n <span>条件一</span>\n <span class=\"kuma-checkmarkbg\"></span>\n <span class=\"kuma-checkmark kuma-icon-choose kuma-icon\"></span>\n </a>\n </li>\n <li class=\"kuma-tag picked\">\n <a href=\"javascript:void(0)\">\n <span>条件二</span>\n <span class=\"kuma-checkmarkbg\"></span>\n <span class=\"kuma-checkmark kuma-icon-choose kuma-icon\"></span>\n </a>\n </li>\n <li href=\"#kuma字体\">KUMA字体</a></li></ul>"},"site/css/layout/index.md":{"title":"Layout","id":"css-layout-index","tags":[],"filepath":"site/css/layout/index.md","directory":"css/layout","filename":"index","meta":{"title":"Layout","description":"\n","order":"1","category":"CSS","chinese":"布局","filepath":"site/css/layout/index.md","filename":"index","directory":"css/layout","id":"css-layout-index","template":"css","html":"<h2 id=\"基本布局\">基本布局</h2><p>基本布局包含三种宽度，分别为<code>kuma-container-1000</code>、<code>kuma-container-1180</code>、<code>kuma-container-full</code></p>\n<div class=\"nico-insert-code\"><style>\n.layout-demo-container {\n margin-bottom: 10px;\n padding: 10px;\n background-color: #DEDEDE;\n}\n</style>\n<div class=\"kuma-container-1000 layout-demo-container\">\n我是kuma-layout-1000\n</div>\n<div class=\"kuma-container-1180 layout-demo-container\">\n我是kuma-layout-1180\n</div>\n<div class=\"kuma-container-full layout-demo-container\">\n我是kuma-layout-full\n</div></div><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"xml\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">style</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"css\">\n<span class=\"hljs-class\">.layout-demo-container</span> <span class=\"hljs-rules\">{\n <span class=\"hljs-rule\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\">margin-bottom</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\"> <span class=\"hljs-number\">10px</span></span></span>;\n <span class=\"hljs-rule\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\">padding</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\"> <span class=\"hljs-number\">10px</span></span></span>;\n <span class=\"hljs-rule\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\">background-color</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\"> <span class=\"hljs-hexcolor\">#DEDEDE</span></span></span>;\n}</span>\n</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">style</span>&gt;</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"kuma-container-1000 layout-demo-container\"</span>&gt;</span>\n我是kuma-layout-1000\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">div</span>&gt;</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"kuma-container-1180 layout-demo-container\"</span>&gt;</span>\n我是kuma-layout-1180\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">div</span>&gt;</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"kuma-container-full layout-demo-container\"</span>&gt;</span>\n我是kuma-layout-full\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\">div</span>&gt;</span></code></pre></div><h2 id=\"栅格布局\">栅格布局</h2><p>每个栅格都由 <code>kuma-row</code> 包裹\n<code>kuma-row</code> 被包含在 <code>kuma-container</code>(固定宽度) 或 <code>kuma-container-fluid</code>(自适应宽度) 中以便于对齐</p>\n<h3 id=\"example-stacked-to-horizontal\">example: Stacked-to-horizontal</h3><div class=\"nico-insert-code\"><style>\n.kuma-row [class^=col-] {\n padding: 5px;\n background-color: #f0f0f0;\n border: 1px solid #e0e0e0;\n}\n</style>\n<div class=\"kuma-row\">\n <div class=\"col-md-1\">.col-md-1</div>\n <div class=\"col-md-1\">.col-md-1</div>\n <div class=\"col-md-1\">.col-md-1</div>\n <div class=\"col-md-1\">.col-md-1</div>\n <div class=\"col-md-1\">.col-md-1</div>\n <div class=\"col-md-1\">.col-md-1</div>\n <div class=\"col-md-1\">.col-md-1</div>\n <div class=\"col-md-1\">.col-md-1</div>\n <div Stacked-to-horizontal</a></li></ul></ul>"},"site/css/table/index.md":{"title":"Table","id":"css-table-index","tags":[],"filepath":"site/css/table/index.md","directory":"css/table","filename":"index","meta":{"title":"Table","description":"\n","order":"4","category":"CSS","chinese":"表格","filepath":"site/css/table/index.md","filename":"index","directory":"css/table","id":"css-table-index","template":"css","html":"<h2 id=\"表格\">表格</h2><blockquote>\n<p>为任意 <code>&lt;table&gt;</code> 标签添加 <code>.kuma-table</code> 类可以为其赋予基本的样式 — 少量的内补（padding）和水平方向的分隔线。 以下罗列出常用的几种table样式</p>\n<ul>\n<li>.kuma-table-condensed<br/></li>\n<li>.kuma-table-hover<br/></li>\n<li>.kuma-table-striped<br/></li>\n<li>.kuma-table-bordered<br/></li>\n</ul>\n</blockquote>\n<h3 id=\"紧凑的表格\">紧凑的表格</h3><blockquote>\n<p>通过添加 .kuma-table-condensed 类可以让表格更加紧凑，单元格中的内补（padding）均会减半。</p>\n</blockquote>\n<div class=\"nico-insert-code\"><table class=\"kuma-table kuma-table-condensed\">\n <thead>\n <tr>\n <th width=\"100\">标题</th>\n <th>标题一</th>\n <th>标题二</th>\n <th>标题三</th>\n <th>发起人</th>\n <th>时间</th>\n <th>系统</th>\n <th>时长</th>\n <th>操作</th>\n </tr>\n </thead>\n <tbody>\n <tr>\n <td><a href=\"#\">标题</a></td>\n <td>标题一</td>\n <td>标题二</td>\n <td>标题三</td>\n <td>发起人</td>\n <td>2012-12-14</td>\n <td>招聘系统</td>\n <td>14小时 </td>\n <td><a href=\"#\">主操作</a></td>\n </tr>\n <tr>\n <td><a href=\"#\">标题内容</a></td>\n <td>标题一</td>\n <td>标题二</td>\n <td>标题三</td>\n <td>发起人</td>\n <td>2012-12-14</td>\n <td>招聘系统</td>\n <td>14小时 </td>\n <td><a href=\"#\">主操作</a></td>\n </tr>\n </tbody>\n</table></div><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"xml\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">table</span> <span <code>.kuma-table-bordered</code> 类为表格和其中的每个单元格增加边框。</p>\n</blockquote>\n<div class=\"nico-insert-code\"><table class=\"kuma-table kuma-table-bordered\">\n <thead>\n <tr>\n <th width=\"100\">标题</th>\n <th>标题一</th>\n <th>标题二</th>\n <th>标题三</th>\n <th>发起人</th>\n <th>时间</th>\n <th>系统</th>\n <th>时长</th>\n <th>操作</th>\n </tr>\n </thead>\n <tbody>\n <tr>\n <td><a href=\"#\">标题</a></td>\n <td>标题一</td>\n <code>New</code></h3><blockquote>\n<p>外面包的结构是为了交互功能的,可以不管</p>\n</blockquote>\n<div class=\"nico-insert-code\"><div class=\"J_TableWrapper\">\n<div class=\"kuma-table-action J_TableFoldWrapper\"><a FormField","id":"scene-commonform-demo-definefield","tags":[],"filepath":"site/scene/commonForm/demo/defineField.md","directory":"scene/commonForm/demo","filename":"defineField","meta":{"title":"表单的扩展1 -- 自定义一个 FormField","description":"\n<p>通过继承 Form.FormField，用户可以自己定义特制的 FormField，以满足各种业务上的需求。<br> 定制的 FormField 同样可以使用 Form 带来通用配置，如布局、样式、校验、值的管理等等。</p>\n","order":"0","filepath":"site/scene/commonForm/demo/defineField.md","filename":"defineField","directory":"scene/commonForm/demo","id":"scene-commonform-demo-definefield","template":"demos","html":"<script>(function(){\"use strict\";\n\nvar _createClass = function () { function defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, configurable: true } }); if (superClass) Object.setPrototypeOf ? Object.setPrototypeOf(subClass, superClass) : subClass.__proto__ = superClass; }\n\nvar Form = require(\"uxcore-form\");\nvar Button = require(\"uxcore-button\");\nvar deepcopy = require('deepcopy');\n\nvar Field = Form.Field;\nvar Other = Form.OtherFormField;\n\nvar DoubleInputFormField = function (_Form$FormField) {\n _inherits(DoubleInputFormField, _Form$FormField);\n\n Object.getPrototypeOf(DoubleInputFormField)).call(this, props));\n }\n\n // 改写 addSpecificClass，增加该 FormField 专属的 class\n\n _createClass(DoubleInputFormField, [{\n key: \"addSpecificClass\",\n value: function addSpecificClass() {\n var me = this;\n if (me.props.jsxprefixCls == \"kuma-uxform-field\") {\n return me.props.jsxprefixCls + \" kuma-doubleinput-uxform-field\";\n } else {\n return me.props.jsxprefixCls;\n }\n }\n\n // 在合适的时机调用 me.handleDataChange，将变动通知给 Form\n\n }, {\n key: \"handleChange\",\n value: function handleChange(index, e) {\n var me = this;\n var value = e.currentTarget.value;\n var stateValue = me.state.value || [];\n stateValue[index] = value;\n me.handleDataChange(stateValue);\n }\n\n // 改写 renderField，决定渲染方式\n\n }, {\n key: \"renderField\",\n value: function renderField() {\n var me = this;\n var arr = [];\n var values = me.state.value || [];\n arr.push(React.createElement(\"input\", { className: \"kuma-input\", value: values[0], onChange: me.handleChange.bind(me, 0), key: \"input1\" }));\n arr.push(React.createElement(\n \"span\",\n { className: \"split\", key: \"split\" },\n \"-\"\n ));\n arr.push(React.createElement(\"input\", { className: \"kuma-input\", value: values[1], onChange: me.handleChange.bind(me, 1), key: \"input2\" }));\n return arr;\n }\n }]);\n\n return DoubleInputFormField;\n}(Form.FormField);\n\nDoubleInputFormField.displayName = \"DoubleInputFormField\"; // 重要，必须 displayName 中带有 FormField 才可以被识别为 FormField。\n\nvar Demo = function me = this;\n alert(JSON.stringify(me.refs.form.getValues()));\n }\n }, {\n key: \"handleReset\",\n value: function handleReset() {\n var me = this;\n me.refs.form.resetValues();\n }\n }, {\n key: \"render\",\n value: function render() {\n var me = this;\n\n // FormField 通用的 props 都可以使用。\n return React.createElement(\n \"div\",\n { className: \"page-demo2\" },\n React.createElement(\n Form,\n { ref: \"form\", jsxvalues: {\n double: [2, 4]\n } },\n React.createElement(DoubleInputFormField, { jsxlabel: \"双输入框\", jsxname: \"double\" }),\n React.createElement(\n Other,\n { className: \"other\" 小李、小王，在展示前，通过 column 的 render 函数来自定义列的渲染。</p>\n","order":"0","filepath":"site/scene/customTable/demo/basic.md","filename":"basic","directory":"scene/customTable/demo","id":"scene-customtable-demo-basic","template":"demos","html":"<script>(function(){\"use strict\";\n\nvar _createClass = function () { function defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if (\"value\" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } } return function (Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }; }();\n\nfunction _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError(\"Cannot call a class as a function\"); } }\n\nfunction _possibleConstructorReturn(self, call) { if (!self) { throw new ReferenceError(\"this hasn't been initialised - super() hasn't been called\"); } return call && (typeof call === \"object\" || typeof call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, configurable: true } }); if (superClass) Object.setPrototypeOf ? Object.setPrototypeOf(subClass, superClass) : subClass.__proto__ = superClass; }\n\nvar Table = require(\"uxcore-table\");\n\nvar Demo = function (_React$Component) {\n _inherits(Demo, _React$Component);\n\n function Demo(props) {\n _classCallCheck(this, Demo);\n\n var _this = _possibleConstructorReturn(this, (Demo.__proto__ || Object.getPrototypeOf(Demo)).call(this, props));\n\n _this.state = {};\n return _this;\n }\n\n _createClass(Demo, [{\n key: \"render\",\n value: function render() {\n var tableProps = {\n width: 700,\n jsxdata: {\n data: [{\n \"name\": '小王',\n \"pinyin\": 'xiaowang'\n }, {\n \"name\": '小李',\n \"pinyin\": 'xiaoli'\n }]\n },\n jsxcolumns: [{ dataKey: 'name', title: '姓名', width: 300, render: function render(cellData, rowData) {\n return React.createElement(\n \"span\",\n null,\n cellData + '同学'\n );\n } }, { dataKey: 'pinyin', title: '拼音', width: 300, render: function render(cellData, rowData) {\n return React.createElement(\n \"span\",\n null,\n cellData + 'tongxue'\n );\n } }]\n };\n return React.createElement(\n \"div\",\n { className: \"page-demo1\" },\n React.createElement(Table, tableProps)\n );\n }\n }]);\n\n return Demo;\n}(React.Component);\n\nReactDOM.render(React.createElement(Demo, null), document.getElementById('scene-customtable-demo-basic'));\n\n/* JS END CSS START*/})()</script><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\">\n<span class=\"hljs-keyword\">let</span> Table = <span class=\"hljs-built_in\">require</span>(<span class=\"hljs-string\">\"uxcore-table\"</span>);\n\n<span class=\"hljs-class\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\">class</span> <span class=\"hljs-title\">Demo</span> <span class=\"hljs-number\">700</span>,\n jsxdata: {\n data: [\n {\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"name\"</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'小王'</span>,\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"pinyin\"</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'xiaowang'</span>\n },\n {\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"name\"</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'小李'</span>,\n <span class=\"hljs-string\">\"pinyin\"</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'xiaoli'</span>\n }\n\n ]\n },\n jsxcolumns: [\n {dataKey: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'name'</span>, title: <span class=\"hljs-string\">'姓名'</span>, width: <span descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if (\"value\" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } } return function (Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }; }();\n\nfunction _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError(\"Cannot call a class as a function\"); } }\n\nfunction _possibleConstructorReturn(self, call) { if (!self) { throw new ReferenceError(\"this hasn't been initialised - super() hasn't been called\"); } return call && (typeof call === \"object\" || typeof call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, configurable: true } }); if (superClass) Object.setPrototypeOf ? Object.setPrototypeOf(subClass, superClass) : subClass.__proto__ = superClass; }\n\nvar classnames = require(\"classnames\");\nvar Form = require('uxcore-form');\nvar Button = href=\"http://gitlab.alibaba-inc.com/uxcore/uxcore-demo/tree/master\">点此</a></a></li></ul>"},"site/start/base/index.md":{"title":null,"id":"start-base-index","tags":[],"filepath":"site/start/base/index.md","directory":"start/base","filename":"index","meta":{"title":null,"description":"\n","order":"0","category":"START","chinese":"开始使用","filepath":"site/start/base/index.md","filename":"index","directory":"start/base","id":"start-base-index","template":"start","html":"<h1 id=\"uxcore\"><a href=\"http://uxco.re/\">UXCore</a></h1><p><a href=\"https://www.npmjs.com/package/uxcore\"><img src=\"https://img.shields.io/npm/v/uxcore.svg?style=flat-square\" alt=\"npm version\"></a> <a href=\"https://david-dm.org/uxcore/uxcore\"><img src=\"https://img.shields.io/david/uxcore/uxcore.svg?label=deps&amp;style=flat-square\" alt=\"Dependency Status\"></a> <a href=\"https://david-dm.org/uxcore/uxcore#info=devDependencies\"><img src=\"https://img.shields.io/david/dev/uxcore/uxcore.svg?label=devDeps&amp;style=flat-square\" alt=\"devDependency Status\"></a></p>\n<p>UXCore is a set of <a href=\"http://facebook.github.io/react/\">React</a> Components that is designed for enterprise-class pc backend application.</p>\n<ul>\n<li><p><strong>Rich library:</strong> more than 35 React Components available with high quality design.</p>\n</li>\n<li><p><strong>Focus on backend App:</strong> Powerful but easy-to-use Form and Table.</p>\n</li>\n<li><p><strong>Customizable theme:</strong> theme can be customized easily.</p>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<p>Before posting an issue, please read the <a href=\"https://github.com/uxcore/uxcore/releases\">CHANGELOG</a> and the README and the documentation to check the recently updated.</p>\n<h2 id=\"for-inner-staff\">For inner staff</h2><p>please see <a href=\"http://groups.alidemo.cn/uxcore/doc/\">http://groups.alidemo.cn/uxcore/doc/</a> for details.<br>集团内部请查看 <a href=\"http://groups.alidemo.cn/uxcore/doc/\">http://groups.alidemo.cn/uxcore/doc/</a> 了解详情。</p>\n<h2 id=\"codepen\">CodePen</h2><p>The easiest way to start hacking on UXCore is using the following CodePen Demo:</p>\n<ul>\n<li><strong><a href=\"http://codepen.io/eternalsky/pen/qZwNVL\">UXCore Demo</a></strong></li>\n</ul>\n<h2 id=\"starter-kit\"><a href=\"https://github.com/uxcore/starter-kit\">Starter kit</a></h2><p>If you&#39;re just getting started, you can download the starter kit. The starter kit is initialized by <a href=\"http://nowa-webpack.github.io/web/index.html?en\">NOWA</a> which is our project-level development and production solution collections.</p>\n<p><a style=\"height: 48px;line-height: 48px;font-size:24px;text-align:center;width: 300px;background: #2599f2;color: white;display:block;border-radius: 5px;margin: 20px auto;text-decoration:none;\" href=\"https://github.com/uxcore/starter-kit/archive/master.zip\" target=\"_blank\">Download Starter Kit 0.2</a></p>\n<h2 id=\"installation\">Installation</h2><p>The fastest way to get started is to serve JavaScript and CSS from the CDN</p>\n<div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"xml\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">link</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">rel</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"stylesheet\"</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">type</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"text/css\"</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">href</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"//g.alicdn.com/??platform/common/s/1.1/global/global.css,uxcore/uxcore-kuma/2.0.7/orange.min.css\"</span>&gt;</span>\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">script</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\">src</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\">\"//g.alicdn.com/uxcore/uxcore/0.1.5/uxcore.min.js\"</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"undefined\"></span></code></pre></div><p>if you&#39;d like to use <a href=\"npmjs.com\">npm</a></p>\n<pre>npm install uxcore</pre><h2 id=\"usage\">Usage</h2><h3 id=\"for-cdn\">For cdn</h3><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\">const</span> {Button} = Uxcore;\nReactDOM.render(<span class=\"xml\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\">Button</span> /&gt;</span>, mountNode);</span></code></pre></div><h3 id=\"for-npm\">For npm</h3><div class=\"highlight\"><pre><code class=\"javascript\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\">import</span> {Button} <span Presentation

  • Album相册
  • Alert警告提示
  • Animate动画
  • Badge徽标
  • Carousel轮播
  • Dialog对话框
  • Dropdown下拉菜单
  • LoadMore加载更多
  • Message全局提醒
  • Popover弹窗
  • Progress进度条
  • Steps步骤条
  • Tag标签
  • Tooltip文字提示

Form Control

  • Button按钮
  • Calendar日期选择框
  • CascadeSelect级联选择
  • Form表单
  • MultiSelect复选择器
  • Pickable筛选器
  • Rate评分
  • Select2选择器
  • Switch开关
  • Tinymce富文本
  • TreeSelect树选择
  • Uploader文件上传

Navigation

  • Collapse折叠面板
  • Crumb面包屑
  • Menu导航菜单
  • Pagination分页
  • Tabs选项卡
  • Totop返回顶部
  • Tree树形控件

Tool

  • Formatter格式化
  • Validator基础校验

Layout

  • Grid栅格
  • Layout左右布局

Matrix

  • Matrix数据矩阵
  • Table表格

Other

  • MentionAt组件
  • Transfer双栏选择框

Transfer

eternalskyuxcore-transfer 0.3.1Changelog

组件演示

基本用法

基本用法。

import Transfer from 'uxcore-transfer';

let mockData = [];
let len = Math.random() * 10 + 10;
for (let i = 0; i < len; i++) {
    mockData.push({
        name: '内容' + (i + 1),
        value: (i + 1),
        description: '内容' + (i + 1) + '的描述',
        chosen: Math.random() * 2 > 1
    });
}

class TransferDemo extends React.Component {
    constructor(props){
        super(props);
    }

    _handleChange(data) {
        console.log(data);
    }

    render() {
        var me = this;
        return (
            <Transfer data={mockData} onChange={me._handleChange.bind(me)}/>
        );
    }
}

ReactDOM.render(
    <TransferDemo />,
      document.getElementById('components-transfer-demo-basic')
);

Usage

let Transfer = require('../src');

let mockData = [];
let len = Math.random() * 10 + 10;
for (let i = 0; i < len; i++) {
    mockData.push({
        name: '内容' + (i + 1),
        value: (i + 1),
        description: '内容' + (i + 1) + '的描述',
        chosen: Math.random() * 2 > 1
    });
}

class TransferDemo extends React.Component {
    constructor(props){
        super(props);
    }

    _handleChange(data) {
        console.log(data);
    }

    render() {
        var me = this;
        return (
            <Transfer data={mockData} onChange={me._handleChange.bind(me)}/>
        );
    }
}

API

  • selectItems(arr): 使对应 value 的变成高亮状态 (selected)。
    参数：
    • arr Array 一个由 value 组成的数组。

Props

参数 类型 必需 默认值 说明
data array required - 用于初始化 transfer 的数据，格式见 Usage，其中 name 和 value 字段必有
disabled boolean optional false 是否启用 disable 模式
showSearch boolean optional true 是否显示搜索条
searchPlaceholder string optional 定位输入内容
leftTitle string optional '未选中的' 左侧标题
rightTitle string optional '已选中的' 右侧标题
onChange func optional noop 选中情况变化时触发，返回选中和未选中的项
© 2015 Alibaba, Inc. Licensed under MIT license.
DESIGNED BY阿里巴巴信息平台前端团队
